1.content:
(Alex's point of view).
I sit down in my computer chair with a freezing cold can of Arctic Breeze in my hand before I plug my head phones into my ears and then I turn the computer on. I just got home from my first job as a Cashier at a gas station and I get the weekend off. I am planning to go to college after summer to become a Earth 2 Officer. I got the idea when I was 13 from Centauri who has always made sure we all wake up at a certain time. Centauri is our family guardian but she has taken up more simpler tasks than blowing Nashtonville soldier heads off. Now she helps mom around the house usually and the only violent thing I have seen her do is almost crack a boys skull in half in grade 5 when he beat the shit out of me and threatened to kill me, Centauri thought he was serious and kicked the kid in the side of the head, The kid is still in a coma today from that day and no charges were filed against Centauri since by law if you shout to someone "Im going to kill you" then you have the right to kill them right there in self defense. Earth 1 has really cracked down on laws recently, If your caught littering your fined 600,000$, If your caught with a knife in school, even if its in your bag your arrested and fined for Violence serving 4 years in a juvenile school, Oh yeah and theft is charged by Murder so if your caught stealing something you get injected with C2X44 which can kill you in 2 minutes or you are killed by firing squad. Due to this Crime rate is almost 0 and the worlds are finally at peace. My sister Teresa however thinks that we are just living under fear and she despises Centauri. So Over the years I am Centauri's favorite, Centauri has the attitude "If you respect me I respect you, If you treat me poorly I treat you poorly" attitude. She is also a great helper at science and math homework. My parents have it easier than other parents. They get a Robot that can fight against 3 thousand humans alone easily to defend there family and it has no problem helping with cleaning and children since it knows exactly what to do to calm a screaming baby down. by scanning its brain activity. My father has taught me for a long time how to fight and since that day Centauri kicked that poor kid in the side of the head she has taught me Military techniques as well. My uncle Colonel Andreas Drachen however has taught me about War tactics and how to disappear in different environments.

What my plan today to do is to play Victory Conquest which is a Conquest game based on the Nashtonville war. The Soul Catchers and Vinichi family does not exist in the game because they are not famously known. Although there are information pages about them on the internet from what people know of them but it is all very vague. All that people know about them is that they are assassination organizations with one being more honorable than the other (The Soul catchers will kill the innocent). My family knows alot more about them than people who research them and are trying to find them. For example people think there headquarters is in China when it really is in Japan from my fathers info. The game loads and I smile before logging in and beginning to play.
1.title: Weekend Game.

11.content: "Ah! You bastard!" I say as my fighter jet begins losing control and it barrels into a building causing a loud explosion that causes other players on the ground's characters to fall from the shock. "haha! got you Alex" says the Neighbors kid and I go back to the character menu to see Centauri as an option for me to use and I smile before clicking it. I control my avatar version of Centauri to begin shooting down fighter jets on the game but for some reason everyones fighter jet stops dodging and instead they drop to the ground slowly meaning they have gone AFK. "What the hell?" I ask over the microphone before I move the avatar down onto the ground and I see everyone is now Afk. "Uh..." I say before a fur covered arm wraps around my neck in a head lock and yanks me away from the computer. "The Fuck!" I shout before I manage to get my pocket knife from my jeans and I open it up with my left hand before I stab backwards into what ever is holding me's face and I hear a yelp before it lets go of me. I quickly turn around to find the person who was holding me is a male wolfkin standing 6 feet 6 inches tall and with some muscle. He has black fur and the odd thing is he is wearing human clothing. He wears a pair of camo pants and a black jacket with a hoody underneath and he snarls at me. "Centauri!" I say but there is no answer so I quickly begin sprinting towards the kitchen. I get a glimpse of the clock on the stove which reads 2:35 AM. I rip open the fridge quickly before I grab a pistol behind an Arctic breeze can and I aim it at him before pulling the trigger and sending a bullet inbetween his eyes. He collapses to the ground with blood leaking out of his skull and I sigh before I hear a noise to my left and I quickly turn just in time to see another Wolfkin holding a 2x4 board and smacking me in the face with it.
11.title: Attack

111.content: I slowly open my eyes to find myself on my knee's with my hands tied behind my back inside some kind of dimly lit cave while we ride through it on old styled train tracks and we are on wooden platforms that hold us on them with Wolfkin watching us and holding Earth 1 guns beside us. The cave is dimly lit by lights along the roof of the cave and from how long the tunnel looks we are going very deep into a mine or a mountain. We eventually reach the end of the tracks which have 40 Wolfkin standing and holding rifles and looking right at us. However one stands out over all. She is a female Wolfkin standing 6 feet 3 inches tall with amazing Obsidian fur (Midnight black). Her eyes are silver like star light and she looks younger than alot of the other Wolfkin, Judging from Science class she looks about my age. She is wearing a pair of black jeans along with a black officer jacket that has white circles around the sleeves and the jacket hangs down to her knee's. She is smiling at us which makes me curious. All I am wearing that is left is a blue t-shirt, Black jeans and black tennis shoes with a pair of dog tags my father made a few years back. The train cart thing stops a few feet infront of the Wolfkin's and then the female one begins walking infront of the rows of people. "What do you want with us?!" screams a woman before the female Wolfkin looks at the woman as she speaks and then growls before walking over to her and then back handing her across the face. "Shut up!!" screams the Wolfkin and the Woman stops speaking with tears now running down her eyes. "I am General Rain Silvarz, You are now all slaves to our Organization" says Rain Silvarz and a Man stands up. "Not a good Idea" I whisper before he begins talking. "Listen, We are not slaves!, We are human be...." begins the man before he throat is grabbed by the Wolfkin who digs her claws into his neck brutally causing blood to drip down his neck. She growls in his face before leading him to the wall and then smashing him against the wall. She takes a laser pistol out of its holster on her belt before pressing it to his head and pulling the trigger before he falls limp and collapses to the ground causing some people to scream. "SHUT UP!!" screams the Wolfkin growling and Everyone becomes quiet. "Now!, What I recommend you all doing is shutting your fucking mouths because if you don't Ill fucking kill you!, Now stand up!" she yells and everyone rises to there feet before she points to a hallway. "Down the hallway!" she commands and we all begin walking.
111.title: Waking up.

1111.content:
"Take this" says a male Wolfkin standing a giant 7 feet 5 inches tall handing me a pickaxe and I look at it. "Start swinging" he says pointing to the wall and I sigh before walking over to the wall and I begin swinging the pickaxe at it. Each time it hits the wall a small part of it falls to the ground. I can hear other bangs echo through the caves from other pickaxes and I turn around to look at the Wolfkin. "Are you gonna stand there all day?" I ask and he crosses his arms continuing to watch me and I sigh before continuing to bash the pickaxe against the wall.

4 hours later....

I drop the pickaxe and I can't take it anymore. "Replacement!" shouts the Wolfkin before grabbing my shoulders and dragging me on the ground and out of the cave where another man is pushed into the cave where I was. The Wolfkin drags me down a long stone hallway that is dimly lit before opening a wooden door and throwing me inside. I sit up and I find myself stuck in a room full of other people from my village all of them looking exhausted. "what the hell" I say before I notice my grandfather. "Grandpa!" i say jogging over to him and he looks at me. "Alex? Thank god your safe!, Where are your parents?" he asks and I shrug. "We have to find a way out of here" I say and he nods. "I have a plan" he says.
1111.title: Slavery.

11111.content: "Alright so here's my plan" says my grandfather. "Plan for what?" asks another prisoner and my grandfather shoves him away before moving us away. My grandfather is wearing a ripped up black jacket, a pair of blue jeans and black workboots. My grandfather is a bit over weight with a greyish black goatee and short black hair. "Lets keep this quiet" says my grandfather and I nod before he begins whispering. "I know where we are, We are near Mount Kroshaar, Most people were knocked out, I wasn't, I faked" he says and I nod before I have a question on my mind. "where the hell was Centauri?" I ask. "I took her to get her upgrade from the government earlier, I told you but you were busy playing some game so you didn't hear a thing" he says and I nod. "Alright, Where is she though?" I ask and he shrugs. "Probably looking for us by now, When we get out however we will need to inform the Wolfkin on our situation" he says and I nod. "Who do you think is behind this?" I ask and he chuckles. "Nitari Silvarz, I know it for sure, You know that Wolfkin with the Silver eyes we saw? Thats her daughter" he says before picking up the bone of a dead animal and snapping it in half with his knee. "make this sharp" he says handing me one part of the bone and I begin rubbing it against the stone floor trying to get it as sharp as I can. "When we get these sharp, We strike and run, If I fall you keep running" he says and I nod before another prisoner walks up. "What are you two doing?" he asks. "Making a tooth pick" says my grandfather and the Prisoner looks at us weird before walking away.
11111.title: Plan.

111111.content: The bones we worked at finally are sharp and easily could kill someone but they are only points, Not knives. "Think of it like a rapier" says my grandfather and I nod even though the bone is only 1 foot 4 inches long with the pointed part only being 8 inches long. "Now wait till the door opens" he says before we position ourselves infront of the door. We wait for a whole hour before the door finally begins to unlock and then opens and we tackle a wolfkin with black fur wearing army pants. I raise my knife above my head and I bring the point down into his neck causing his blood to spray out of his neck. I rip the knife out before my grandfather helps me up and we begin sprinting down the caves. My grandfather leads me left, then right, and then left again and again till we reach a large open area with hundreds of Wolfkin down below sitting at tables and eating and talking. "Stay silent" says my father before the two of us begin to scale along the wall towards an open exit with one guard standing outside looking in the opposite direction. My grandpa crouches down and begins making his way towards the guard who he stabs in the neck with his bone knife and then throwing him down the mountain. "Come on!" he says in a hushed tone and I follow him outside. The view is beautiful, It shows hundreds of mountains in the distance and there is a fresh layer of snow on the ground. "Lets go" he says before we begin to climb down.
111111.title: Attack

1111111.content:
"Aw....No way in hell" says my grandfather looking down a huge ice slide that has been used recently and I begin examining it. "Its a Kroz Slathk" I say looking down it and seeing it leads all the way down the mountain. "A what?" asks my Grandfather and I remember he doesn't speak Wolfkin nor does he know the history. "a Kroz Slathk means Ice Slide, Wolfkin have used them as far as there history has been recorded and the Zugots even have earlier dates for them than the Wolfkin, So its safe I assure you, Wolfkin use them as easy transportation down mountains or they use them for entertainment purposes, There is usually some kind of padding at the bottom of them so we should have a soft landing and hopefully we don't crash into a Huk tree, just don't panic and aim straight, if you slide off one of these the wrong way you can get ripped apart by an object in your way" I say and he nods. "Great....alright then" he says before I climb up and I sit down on the edge. I can feel the chill of the ice through my jeans and I take a deep breath before pushing myself forward. The closest thing I can say to explain what it feels like is a fighter jet going mach 10 straight down to the ground in a nose dive.

I say my prayers as I begin sliding almost straight down on a sheet of ice and struggle not to try to stop myself because I know that, that is not what you ever do on these things. I lay back and I begin going increasingly faster before the Kroz Slathk cuts to the left and I slide up on the wall almost over the edge before the slide begins flattening out and I let out a breath of relief and soon it slows down enough for me to get out. My grandpa is right behind me and he overshoots the exit causing him to roll across the ground laughing. "That was actually alot of fun" he says and I smile before he points into the forest. "Wolfkin city is that way, including the closest town, Lets go" he says and I nod before we begin running.
1111111.title: Slide.

11111111.content:
"It would be well appreciated if we could meet here" says my grandpa talking to my Uncle on a payphone. "I don't give a shit we got bigger problems!" says my grandpa and I chuckle before he seems to have gotten an agreement. "Yes get Centauri and tell her to get her ass over here" he says before hanging up the phone and pointing across the street. "Lets go get some eggs" he says and I nod before we look both ways and then cross the street.

"Wow...Shit hole" says my uncle Andreas after sitting down in the booth we are in. "Hello Colonel can I get you anything?" asks the Waitress. "Coffee please" he replies and she nods before walking away. My uncle is wearing a Colonels Uniform which is made up of a trench coat that hangs to his shins and has 3 blue stripes around the sleeves and around the bottom of the jacket. He has all of his metals on the left side of his jacket over his heart and he has an officer hat sitting on the table. My uncle has never married since he spends all year at Luna usually and wouldn't have time for a wife. "So, Nitari's back?" he asks and I nod. "Yes, We need you to bring some soldiers to save the people" I say before his coffee arrives and he drinks it black with no sugar. "Can't do that" he says and me and my grandfather Gawk at him. "What the hell do you mean?" I ask and he looks up. "Exactly what I said, Centauri is all the help you need and Earth 1 doesn't want to risk soldiers unless it is fully necessary" he says and my grandfather looks pissed. "Andreas this is your fucking Sister and her husband in there!" says my grandfather and he nods before drinking some of his coffee. "Tastes like shit" he says before dumping it into a plant and putting the cup down. "I know that, Which is why Centauri will assist, If I went to the Overseer right now and requested to send Soldiers to there death he would probably put me in prison and experiment on me to see if I was mentally retarded" he says before Centauri walks into the restaurant and she gets a few curious glances from the people inside for a second. She walks up to us and bows to Andreas. "Centauri, Do you think it would be smart to send 300 soldiers into our current situation?" he asks and she shakes her head. "That would be a horrible tactical error since our soldiers are limited" she says and he nods. "see? and thats from a robot with all the info you could ever need right there telling you" he says and I cant believe this. "Fine we will go to the Wolfkin" says my Grandfather and Andreas stops him. "Alright but, your not using earth 1 government request, If you say that the earth 1 government requires the help Centauri will arrest you" he says before picking up his hat and putting it on. "Nice to see you nephew, Here, Here is a present for your future....conflict" he says before handing me a black revolver and its holster. "Thanks...." I say and he nods. "Sorry I can't help, My hands are tied, Good luck" he says before walking out of the dinner and getting into a armored government truck. "So how are we traveling?" asks Centauri and I look at my Grandfather who is smiling.
11111111.title: RiverCanyon.

111111111.content:
"Awesome!" I say looking at a Zugot train sitting infront of us. A Zugot train is black and heavily armored with Zugot soldiers sitting ontop of the train cars holding Zugoten rifles and looking at us standing infront of the train. The front of the train has a giant light on the front of it and there are about 40 cars in total. There are only 3 cars that humans are allowed into because technically the Zugot trains are only for Zugot's wanting to see all of Earth 2 in Luxury and without the fear of getting robbed. A few weeks ago I heard on the news that 9 criminals tried robbing a Zugot train armed to the teeth with explosives and assault rifles, they only lasted 5 seconds before being Vaporized by the Zugot's and there explosives did absolutely nothing, didn't even scratch the armor of the train. "Humans, stay in human cars or we throw humans off" says a Zugot conductor wearing a black robe with a glowing blue trim and wearing a Zugot respirator. His fur is black and his eyes are blue. "understood" says my grandfather paying our tickets and we get onboard.

The interior is lit with glowing blue tube lights on the floors, walls and ceiling and the walls are made out of the black armor that the exterior is made out of with tinted windows. Everything is written in Zugoten which looks like kind of like Korean with a mix of chinese and a bit of Latin looking symbols as well, It has similarities to Wolfkin and Sakia but its much more complex written but extremely easier than Sakia to speak since in Sakia Hello said wrong could mean shit face. We take a seat in a chair that lights up when we sit down and a few Zugots walk through the cabin in uniform before a few other humans board the train. "Wow, Amazing eh?" comments a man to his family before they sit down, They sound Ukrainian or Russian by there accent. The train begins moving after a few minutes and easily picks up speeds about 400mph. "Here we go" I say looking out the window.
111111111.title: To the Wolfkin city.

1111111111.content:
(Rain Silvarz's point of view).
"Excuse me General, But may I speak with you?" asks a Colonel and I sigh. "Get in, stand there, wait or do what ever you want, Im bathing" I say before grabbing my bowl of Kosho and I dip my hand into it. Kosho is a Wolfkin shampoo used to clean skin and fur, Kosho actually means "Clean" in Wolfkin. The Colonel begins getting undressed and when she is done she gets in beside me and takes a scoop of Kosho before beginning to wash her breasts. Our organization forces females to bath together in a warm river that is 25 feet in width and has a slow but constant current. "So colonel are you going to play with yourself or tell me what the problem is?" I ask and she blushes before sitting down in the water which is about 4 feet from where we are. "2 prisoners are missing" she says and I stop washing my ears and I sigh. "Who?" I ask and she grabs a piece of paper from her jacket behind her and looking at the names. "Alexander Van Vinichi and Michael Vinichi" she says and I sigh. "Alright, Send the notice to my mother when you are done" I say before diving into the water and swimming up to the surface before swimming back over to the edge and I climb up. "Will do General" she says before I walk down the hall into the fire pit which is where everyone goes and sits to dry off and I grab one of the books off of the wall before sitting down and beginning to read. I've always loved Reading, especially Wolfkin Literature since its not full of the shit that Human literature has in it.
1111111111.title: Problems.

11111111111.content:
"KIRASA!" yells my grandfather to a female Wolfkin who turns around mid way through the gates and smiles before walking towards us. "Hello again Michael Vinichi what brings you to the Wolfkin city?" asks Kirasa and my grandfather thinks of a way to say it. "Well....Uh..." begins my grandfather but Centauri just gives it straight up. "Nitari Silvarz and her followers have kidnapped Earth 1 citizens and are holding them and using them as slaves" says Centauri and Kirasa Lowers her ears which looks kind of cute. "This...is worse than I think it is....right?" asks Kirasa and I nod. "They are using Earth 1 Weaponry" I say. "Fothus (Fuck)" she says before thinking. "Has Nitari had a son?" asks Kirasa and I shake my head. "Daughter" says my grandfather and Kirasa smiles. "That must have pissed Nitari off" says Kirasa before a male Wolfkin walks up wearing a black robe and carrying on his back is a big black backpack full of something. He has Black fur with blue eyes and he stands 6 feet tall which is very short for a male Wolfkin since the average height for a Wolfkin male is 7 feet 8 inches with the tallest height being 9 feet for a very tall Wolfkin. The tallest Wolfkin ever recorded by Wolfkin history is a Wolfkin named Zabathuur who was the Wolfkin who made contact with the Wolfkin god, He was a mighty warrior with fur that shined silver and he stood a giant 14 feet tall and wielded a giant 9 foot long 2 handed sword. Royal Wolfkin are said to have Zabathuur's blood in there veins even though Takinari only is 7 feet 8 inches tall which is considered Very tall for a female Wolfkin. Females are usually 5 feet 9 inches to a maximum of 7 feet 3 inches. Most Females stop growing at about 6 feet usually. Zabathuur is a sacred name and is only allowed to be given to Wolfkin of Royal blood. If a Wolfkin were to name her child Zabathuur and she was not Royal her child and her would be burned to death because they would be considered evil and Wolfkin believe they would desecrate the name of the first king. The Wolfkin have an After life where they look after there loved ones and spend eternity together and they have a version of hell for the evil Wolfkin called Falkin which is where Wolfkin will always be alone and will never escape or see light again, All they can do is scream and beg there god for redemption but it never comes. "Hello" says the Wolfkin standing infront of us putting out his hand and I shake it. "This is my Son Altrozk" says Kirasa and my grandfather smiles. "So Altrozk, Are you in the Wolfkin army like your mother and father?" asks my grandfather and he shakes his head. "I am a Trader, I travel to human cities and sell authentic historical Wolfkin weaponry" he says before smiling. He looks to be about 22 and he doesn't have very much muscle like most male Wolfkin meaning he has never had a liking to warfare and instead has invested all of his early life in learning how to trade and not get ripped off. "Do you know how to fight?" I ask him and he nods. "I don't fight like most of my kind however, I prefer using a Skyth" he says and I notice it on his hip.

A Skyth is a Wolfkin version of the Rapier kind of. A rapier is meant for stabbing but it can be used to slash as well. a Skyth cannot. A Skyth requires 100% stabbing since it has no blade. It is pretty much just a long metal point with a hilt guard. They are extremely effective however if you know how to use them. Humans have been extremely surprised by how easily a Wolfkin can rip a sword out of your arms while using the right technique with a Skyth. Skyth's never dull unless you bash the tip repeatedly into a wall or something. 99.9% of Wolfkin soldiers never use Skyth's since they have absolutely no power behind the weapon and require pure agility and balance with skill to use. It takes 15 years to master a Skyth which is another reason since you can easily learn to use a battle axe. Skyth's are usually wielded with a Defending dagger called a Skak which is a curved dagger used to help defend and slash/stab if needed. Altrozk has his Skyth tied to his belt and his Skak there as well with the metal made out of the famous Black metal the Wolfkin call Torvok. "Ill bring word to Takinari about the situation, If you'd like son you may go with Michael Vinichi, He is a good human" says Kirasa and Altrozk nods. "If he would like me to I will" he says and my grandfather nods. "That would be fine, Kirasa will you be attacking them ASAP?" asks my grandfather and she nods. "We have to, Earth one might assume its us and if they are killing Sakia then we got another war on our heads" says Kirasa and my grandfather nods. "We will meet you there" he says before we say goodbye and take our leave.
11111111111.title: Wolfkin city.

111111111111.content:
(Mausso's point of view).
Razor wire wraps tightly around a man before he could escape out of the room and I use the wire to force him to smash into the wall. "DADDY!!" Screams the little girl we are kidnapping and Kia tackles her to the ground. "YOU JUST HAD TO KEEP YOUR MOUTH SHUT!!" roars Kia using her claws to slash the girl repeatably across the face and arms while she tries to defend herself. Kia switched her robe to black last year which gives her a much more scary appearance. I make the wire tighter around the man causing the razor blades on the wire to begin cutting into his skin. "Pay attention little Misa!, This is what happens when you misbehave!!" screams Kia forcing the little girl to watch who now has hundreds of cuts all over her face, scarring her beauty for life. I smile as the razor wire begins slowly wrapping around the mans face, bloody tears crawling down his cheeks. I jerk my arm to the left smashing it into the ball before the Razor wire rips the man into shreds of flesh and bone sending pieces all around the room, Raining down ontop of Kia, the Girl and myself. "Daddy!!" screams the little girl and I close my eyes taking in the sweet scent of death. "Now, Misa, We have much much fun ahead of us Misa" says Kia before I see her small cute cat like tongue appear out of the shadows of her hood to lick a bloody tear from Misa's cheek which makes the fear climax in Misa's eyes. Kia isn't a lesbian, She's only 8 years old, She just has a blood lust like everyone else and doing a move like that is fun for Kia because it gives her the feeling of dominance. "Come like a good girl Misa, Or do we have to go get your baby brother?" I ask and she shakes her head while crying. "Excellent, Kia, Portal" I say and Kia giggles evilly before a portal opens and then she begins leading Misa into the portal and I smile before walking through.

I feel the life force inside of myself die out before my robes magically turn into what they truly are, Shredded. Most of my skin rots away with what is left becoming a greenish brown color and my eyes turn black with a small green iris. Kia closes the portal and stretches her spine which I can see through her shredded robes and she smiles at me with a mouth full of sharp teeth and 2 fangs. Misa however looks the exact same and is now in a full panic. Infront of us is our masters castle with hundreds of twisted corrupt creatures walking by us, guarding the front walls to The Castle of Suffer. Me and Kia begin walking towards the front gates with Kia keeping one of her claws to Misa's neck.

(Kia's point of view).
"Kia, What shall we turn her into?" asks Mausso after I sit down on a bench made out of human bones. "hmm..." I say thinking before pulling my hood off of my head while putting on a scary cat mask at the same time. I am the Overseer of creation in the Suffer realm, My home for thousands of years. I was human, once, A long long time ago, I was the Emperor of China's Daughter in ancient china till one day when our Lord found me, He tricked me and turned me into a half cat half human creature with modifications of course, Mainly my claws. He returned me after I begged him to release me and he did, But my Father called me a Demon and didn't want anything to do with me, He kicked me out and Banished me, Telling everyone I was dead. Our Lord Showed himself to me again and I had to come with him. And here we are, 4000 years later I think. "Well we could change her into a Troll" says Mausso making his hands glow red to turn her into a troll and I push him aside before putting my clawed hand onto Misa's forehead before I erase all of her memories and then I change her into a troll. "There, Objective done, Now in 5 months we will go kidnap another child" I say smiling and Mausso smile before picking me up to give me a piggy back ride. "Yay!" I say happily as he begins walking up the stairs so that we can go see our Lord.
111111111111.title: Such sweet sweet Suffering.

1111111111111.content:
(Venomous' point of view).
"Father" says my son walking into our camp and I look up before he hands me my laser sword and I take it. My son is the same as me, Black scales for skin, Snake eyes, Snake tongue, Weird S sound speech problem, Clawed hands and feet and a long tail that now has a Earth 1 device on the end of it so that he can use it as a weapon if he wishes. He is dressed in a navy blue jacket that hangs down to his shins with black baggy jeans and a pair of black running shoes. On his hands he wears black fingerless gloves and around his neck he wears a black scarf. The two of us are far up North in the mountains trying to find a Earth 1 Helicopter that crashed up here during the Nashtonville war and is thought to have a Rad gun inside it. Rad means Radiation, They were just being developed during the Nashtonville war and are known to be able to burn a hole through someone in 40 milliseconds. It would fetch a giant reward for returning it to Earth 1. "How far issss it from here?" he asks sitting down beside me infront of the fire and I look at the map. "About 500 milessss" I reply and he shrugs. "That sssshould take about....3 dayssss?" he asks looking at the mountains infront of us and I nod. "Put on ssssome better glovessss and footwear for god ssssakessss" I say and he chuckles before pulling out a pistol and beginning to clean it. His mother died during birth due to his claws causing more damage on the way out which was a hard blow to me but I've gotten over it. Im not sure about him though, He never talks about it. "Would you like to head out?" he asks and I nod before standing up. "Lets go" I say stomping out the fire with my boot and then walking over to our Dirt bikes.
1111111111111.title: Father and Son.

11111111111111.content:
(Alex's point of view).
"What took so long?" I ask my father before throwing a stick into the fire. "Had to call someone" he replies and I shrug. "Human technology does not make sense" says Altrozk examining Centauri who ignores him completely. "Why make something to defend yourself? Is it laziness?" asks Altrozk and I shake my head. "They make robots to make things easier and more effective" I say and he shakes his head. "You make Robots stronger than you, there for they are superior and therefor they can kill you easier than you kill them" he says and he has a point but im gonna ignore it. "Alright so the Wolfkin army is in Route to Nitari and will be ready to strike in a few days, we are going to meet them there, We should leave tomorrow" says my grandfather and Altrozk shakes his head. "We leave tonight" he says and we all turn to him. "There route is quicker and easier, ours is harder and slow, We need to leave tonight if we want to have any chance in fighting them" he says before my Grandfather shrugs. "Alright tonight it is" states my grandfather and I chuckle.
11111111111111.title: North bound.

111111111111111.content:
(Kirasa's point of view).
"FROK!!!! (Charge!!!!)" I yell pointing my sword to the entrance of the cave and the Wolfkin soldiers begin running towards the entrance and I charge with them all of us giving a battle cry.

(Altrozk's point of view).
I jump down a ledge onto the floor below before pointing my Skyth and Skak at 4 Wolfkin standing infront of me. They are dressed in human clothing and to my luck are holding real swords. All of them are males standing roughly 7 feet tall and wearing black clothing. "Fika Sukontai Shukaro (Come quietly shorty)" says one of the Wolfkin and I smile before they charge. I block two of the attacks and I duck under the other two slashes before my Skyth blocks one of there swords which I spin around before kicking his hand causing him to release his sword before I stab my Skyth through his chest and blocking another strike while kicking another Wolfkin back. I grab his sword in mid air before throwing it at one of the Wolfkin causing him to hit it out of the way which I use to my advantage to charge him. I slide across the stone floor before I stab my Skak into his groin as I slide between his legs. He howls in pain before I stab my Skyth up into his back before pulling it out in time to kick his body into one of his allies. I pick a dagger off the ground in time to block the next strike before I stab my Skyth into him and then I throw the dagger into the chest of the final one. I smile before grabbing my Skak and Skyth and then sprinting down a stone hallway where gun fire is erupting from.

(Alex's point of view).
I draw the pistol my uncle gave me and I take aim at a Wolfkin before pulling the trigger sending a bullet through his head. I sprint up to his body and I grab his laser rifle before I turn it to automatic and I take cover. I check the powercells to see 80% remaining before Centauri uses her rockets on the bottom of her feet as roller blades, only using a small amount of the power to make her hover and she quickly zips around the corner. I jump out of Cover to see her dealing with these Wolfkin with ease, Stomping ones head in while she's at it. I run past her before I see my mother behind cover holding a Laser pistol. I run across a fire fight before sliding across the stone floor beside her. "Alex?" asks my mother and I nod before she gives me a quick hug. "Wheres dad?" I ask and she shrugs. "I've been looking for him" she says before standing up quickly and firing her pistol twice before ducking back down. "I think he is near the headquarters of this place, Its down the left hall" she says pointing. "Alright, Ill go see what I can do" I say and she nods. "Be careful" she says and I smile before I begin sprinting across the fire fight.

My adrenalin kicks in that runs in my families blood and everything goes slow. I take aim at the Wolfkin firing at us and I pull the trigger sending little red hot lights through there bodies and they drop dead. I begin sprinting down the hallway with my heart beating quickly.

I kick open the last prison door revealing my father chained to the wall. He is wearing shredded clothing that use to be a shirt and pants and his face and body is bruised from torture. "father!" I say running up to him and he looks up. "What the hell is going on out there?" he asks and I go to reply before he looks behind me and I turn around in time to see a female Wolfkin with green eyes get her head blown off from someone wearing a white robe and holding a shotgun. "Good Luck" he says before sprinting down the hallway. "That guy was from the organization....What the hell is..." he begins but i answer him. "The Wolfkin army has come and are massacring this cult" I say and he smiles before I grab the key off the wall that was on a hook and I unlock his shackles. My father takes a second to stand up before he weakly follows me outside into the hallway where we find Kirasa running down the hall. "Lets end this!" says Kirasa running up some stairs and we follow.
111111111111111.title: 3 days later.

1111111111111111.content:
The 3 of us break through the door revealing Nitari Silvarz sitting behind a desk with Rain Silvarz standing in the center of the room. "Ah....Kirasa" says Nitari in a kind but evil tone. "You really broke the dam this time Nitari, Your madness can only be cured by Death" says Kirasa and Nitari laughs. "Oh that's a good one, Yes add a small little joke to it" says Nitari standing up from behind the desk and I look at Rain who is looking at us with her hands by her side. "So, This is your Daughter Rain?" asks Kirasa looking at Rain and Nitari nods. "Nice to Finally meet you, Kirasa" says Rain giving a slight nod and Kirasa looks back at Nitari. "So how is this going to work Nitari?, Are you going to make your daughter fight us while you make a run for it?" asks Kirasa and Nitari walks up behind Rain. "No, Im gonna fight" says Nitari before I see her holding a dagger. "Rain" says Nitari and Rain turns before Nitari grabs her shoulder and thrusts the knife into Rain's gut. Rain Screams in agony before collapsing to the ground with the dagger in her gut still tears showing in her eyes.

"MOTHER!!" screams Rain after pulling the dagger out and holding her wound while gripping Nitari's robe. "Oh Rain, Sorry to say this but....Wait I am not sorry. Your not worthy to carry my blood, Your weak and you spend your free time reading and looking for love instead of doing your job, Your weak and you don't deserve to be my Daughter" says Nitari and Rain looks heart broken before Nitari kicks her across the snout and Rain hits the ground with her eyes closes. "You really are a monster" says Kirasa and Nitari smiles. "You can call me that if you wish, But I am stronger than you" says Nitari and Kirasa looks down at Rain before shaking her head slowly. "Your daughter, The last one to stand by your side out of love and respect for you was just murdered by you in cold blood, Your a disgrace to our people and Religion" says Kirasa and Nitari growls. "Come on you three, fight me" says Nitari pulling out a sword and the three of us charge.

Nitari grabs hold of my father who reaches her first and then throws him across the floor before clashing swords with me and spinning around, rewarding me with a slash across the chest just deep enough to draw a small amount of blood. She grabs me by the hair before clashing swords with Kirasa and then throwing me to the ground.

(Rain's point of view).
I look up to see my mother and Kirasa in a sword fight with my Mother biting and clawing at Kirasa. I look to my right to see a pistol on the ground and I grit my teeth from the fire like pain of my wound. I begin to slowly crawl across the floor desperately trying to get this pistol to end this fight. I reach it and I grip it tightly in my right hand before I spin around and I aim it at my mother who has tripped Kirasa and is ready to stab her.

(Nitari's point of view).
I raise my sword above my head and I smile knowing I am finally getting my revenge. A loud ZANG!! echo's through the room and I freeze as a red hot pain forms in my chest inbetween my breasts and I look down to see a burnt hole from a laser pistol. I look forward to see my Daughter laying on the ground holding the pistol growling before aiming to my face and my eyes widen before a red light flashes infront of my eyes.

(Kirasa's point of view).
A red laser bullet burns its way inbetween Nitari's eyes in a blink before she collapses limp and lifeless ontop of me. I shove her off before looking at Rain who drops the pistol and begins crying as Wolfkin soldiers run into the room and look around before sheathing there weapons and looking at all of us. "Help her" I command a medic and she nods before bending down and beginning to try to save her.

I stand up and I walk over to Marco before helping him up and we nod at each other before he looks at Rain. "What will happen to her?" asks Marco. "She will face the Royal court, If found guilty she will be killed probably, If found not guilty she will be set free but will probably be considered an outcast by most of the Wolfkin Society for what she did" I reply. "Your welcome to watch the court" I say and he nods. "will do"
1111111111111111.title: Nitari Silvarz.

11111111111111111.content:
(Rain Silvarz's point of view).
"You may now say what you wish to explain why you should live" says Takinari and I stand up from my chair. A Wolfkin Court room has a large circular area for the defendant to sit in. There is no jury, The Queen takes the Upper class' opinion but over all it is her choice if I live or die. Wolfkin sit all around the court room on 3 different floors watching my case with the Vinichi family sitting in the front row. I have been charged with High Treason, Assassination attempts and Mass murders so im pretty deep in the gutter. "Your Majesty, I do not have anything to say, I just followed orders that my mother had given me, For that I am sorry" I say and everyone in the court room curses at me and calls me names causing me to lower my ears and tuck my tail under my paw. "I do" says Kirasa standing up behind me and I look back at her surprised. "Very well Kirasa, What is it you have to say?" asks Takinari. "Rain may have done things that were wrong all her life, But I must ask you this, What other choice did she have?, You, yourself have heard Nitari say that if her child was a girl she would murder it, But she didn't for one reason or another, Nitari while I was fighting her had nothing but Blood Lust in her eyes, she was a monster, A young woman like Rain would be scared by that....Someone as Cruel as Nitari probably never showed Rain love, She probably beat the poor girl brutally, I think you would have done the same thing if all your mother had done all your life was beat you and put you down for everything you did, Rain was trying to win her mothers affection but never got it due to Nitari's cold heart" says Kirasa and I look up at the Queen who is thinking. "Rain Silvarz, I find you not Guilty, However if I ever see you in this court room again I will have you burned" says Takinari before standing up and walking out of the court room and a few Wolfkin complain but accept the verdict anyways.

I wag my tail happily and I perk up my ears knowing I am going to live. "Congratulations" says Kirasa and I thank her before I look over at the Vinichi family who is packing up. "Alex Vinichi" I say and he looks at me. He has short black hair and blood red eyes which is odd for a human and he is currently wearing a pair of black jeans and a white shirt. "May I speak with you?" I ask and he nods before walking up. "What do you want?" he asks and I sigh. "I know that this won't mean anything to you but....I am sorry for my actions...." I say lowering my ears. "Ill believe you if you can prove it" he says and I tilt my head to the left. "How?" I ask. "Me, My grandfather and my sister are going to go investigate children disappearing all around Earth 1 and Earth 2" he says and I think about it. "Alright I can help" I say and he smiles. "Alright, Im just curious though, Why are you all of a suddenly so happy?" he asks. "I just got out of the death penalty, My bitch of a mother is dead making me free and now I can actually accomplish something" I reply. "alright" he says before turning around and continuing to walk away.
11111111111111111.title: Trial.

111111111111111111.content:
2 weeks after the Trial.....

(Alex's point of view).
"Wow this....wow" I say looking at pictures of a victim that was ripped apart with what people say was Razor wire. "How can Wire do this exactly?" asks Teresa my sister sitting across the table. Teresa has short black hair with blue eyes and her bangs close to her eyes like our mother. She is wearing a pink T-shirt and black jeans. "It can't usually unless you had something with super human strength ripping an entire coil of Razor wire across someone" says Rain sitting beside me. Rain has stayed silent alot of the time she has been with us, She doesn't usually join conversations and usually only talks when it has to do with the cases of these. "We have data of very similar incidents happening back during the Napoleonic Era, However it has to be a copy cat of someone who was a sadist is what I am thinking" says my Grandfather and I sigh. We are sitting in the City hall of the last killing in a town called Krotkat. The child that went missing was named Misa Orinowa. We suspect that the person capturing the children works along side a child because from what the evidence shows is that the Children always seem to be lured somehow, A full grown man or Woman that the child does not know in the middle of the Night coming in through the window or closet would scare the child and cause them to scream for the parents, However, this child along with a few others in the history of the kidnappings screamed when they saw who ever it was immediately, The criminals panicked most likely when the father came in and began trying to protect his little girl and some how he got ripped apart by razor wire. "This reminds me of an incident with your father...." says my grandfather and I look up. "Its the reason why your father has his arm, Someone by the name of Mausso stole a child in Italy" he says and I think before pulling up my laptop and searching the name Mausso. One of the links says The Children Of Suffer so I click it and then a page pops up with the boarder wrapped up in bloody Razor wire. I read through the website and from what I get out of it is that it is a Cult devoted to worshiping Pain, Bondage, Domination and Submission, Darkness, Sacrifice and The theory that Pain and Suffering purifies the soul allowing a mortal to achieve immortality in there Gods Realm that they call The Suffer Realm. I show it to everyone else and after they read through it everyone but Rain thinks its nuts. "Why do you think its real?" asks Teresa. "Its the only thing that makes sense" says Rain and I think about it. "Ludicrous" says Teresa and Rain stands up. "Im going to go out" says Rain picking up her jacket and walking to the door. "Ill come with you" I say and she nods allowing me before I grab my jacket and we leave.
111111111111111111.title: Information.

1111111111111111111.content: Me and Rain both turn the corner on the street with the side walk wet from the Rainstorm that stopped not long ago. Rain is holding her jacket shut by having her arms crossed and she is keeping her head slightly down. "Would you like to talk Rain?" I ask her and she looks at me. "depends..." she says and I think. "Would you like to talk about your life?" I ask and she thinks before water drops begin falling again. "As long as I can remember, My mother has...Beaten me, Id always try to make her proud.....show her that I am worth being loved, However she never did anything for me, My life was all about training and trying to make my mother happy....She never did approve of anything I did, She always put me down and ruined anything good I had..." she says and I see tears in her eyes so I hand her a piece of cloth in my jacket and she thanks me before drying her tears. The two of us stop walking and take a seat on a bench to talk more. "When I was 8, My father gave me a puppy to play with.....my mother forced me to kill it" she says tears now dripping down her cheeks near her snout while she thinks about her sad long life. "My mother never hugged me....She never even told me that she loved me....Am I that much of a failure?" she asks and I wrap an arm around her shoulder to give her a hug. "No, your not a failure, You tried your hardest to please your psychotic cold hearted mother, Its not your fault" I say and she rests her head on my shoulder which is a bit awkward but I keep talking. "Other kids have teased me all my life due to my eyes, Thinking im a mutated experiment or something, The truth is they come from my fathers arm" I say and she nods. "Thank you for talking to me, most people don't give me the time you have" she says before rubbing the side of her face and muzzle affectionately against my face before standing up and beginning to walk down the road. What she just did is usually a sign that a Wolfkin likes someone more than just friendship....I think she just did it as a thank you but I might be wrong. I stand up and I walk back to city hall to continue on our information search.
1111111111111111111.title: Talking.

11111111111111111111.content:
(Rain's point of view).
I walk into the restaurant and I take a seat at the bar before covering my eyes with my arm while resting my head on the bar. I don't know why I rubbed my face against Alex's, He just was so caring and nice to me in my time of need instead of just shoving me away so maybe thats why I did it, But I want to do it again....for some reason. "Hello, What can I get for you?" asks the waitress and I look up at her. She looks about 20 with long blond hair and green eyes. "Uh...I don't know..." I say letting my head hit the counter and I sigh. "Are you ok?" she asks and I shake my head before getting an idea. "I have a question" I say and she gives me a questioning look. "If you found yourself attracted to a male Wolfkin who was nice, spent time with you even when it was not needed, would you build upon it or leave it and bury it?" I ask and she looks confused. "I don't know sorry" she says and I sigh. "Its fine" I say before I turn around on the stool and I see across the road a Woman standing there, watching me. She has short blond hair and has her eyes hidden by a pair of black sunglasses. She is wearing a black long jacket like me that hangs to her shins and she is just standing there smiling. "Have a Nice day" I say to the waitress before walking out of the restaurant and I walk across the street. "Can I help you?" I ask her and she smiles at me. "Nein, but Ich vill see du again fery fery soon Rain Silfarz" she says with some kind of European accent and she looks over her sunglasses revealing ocean blue eyes. "Guten Tag Rain Silfarz, Ich vill be Vatching du" she says before beginning to walk away and I turn around and begin walking back to city hall.
11111111111111111111.title: Thoughts.

111111111111111111111.content:
(Alex's point of view).
"Holy shit" I say staring at the blood bath infront of us. "Oh god!" says Teresa before running out of the room and vomiting downstairs. "Hmm" says Rain before bending over and picking something up. "Whats that?" I ask and she shows it to me. "It looks like a piece of Razor wire" says rain holding it in her hands before the wire quickly tightens like a vice around Rains hand causing blood to rapidly drip from her hand. "Gah! Fothus!! (Gah! Fuck!!!)" Shouts Rain and I look at the Razor wire which is slowly moving like a snake and absorbing small amounts of Rain's blood. "Here" I say taking a pair of pliers from the drawer before gripping the wire with them and pulling the blades out of her hand. "Ow..ow ow ow OW!!" says Rain before cursing as I remove the last of the Razor wire and it moves around very very slowly. "This...Is Bazaar" says my Grandfather looking at the Razor wire before putting his finger close to it and it snaps towards his finger. "Put it in something" he says before I take my sisters metal water bottle and I put it in. "Lets go" I say before we walk down the stairs.

"Im curious what this thing..." I begin before a car slams into us so hard ours almost flips over. "Gah!!" I shout before unbuckling my seatbelt and then the door opens revealing a man that looks very similar to Sarok Magiak. "Hello Vinichi" He says smiling before grabbing the water bottle and walking out of view. I crawl my way out of the car just in time to see him take off full speed in a black car with the front end smashed. "Who...The Fuck...Was that!!" screams Rain obviously pissed off and getting out of the car in time to see the car speeding away. "Gah!, Asshole" she says before beginning to help Teresa and my Grandfather out. "He looked like Sarok" I say and Rain stops. "Wait....that was shade?" she asks and we all turn to her. "Who?" asks Teresa before my grandfather gives Rain a serious face. "Tell us, Everything you know about anyone" he says and she lowers her ears.
111111111111111111111.title: Another incident.

1111111111111111111111.content: "Dammit!" says my grandfather while we speed down the road. "I don't understand whats wrong, He just funded my mothers organization" says Rain and My grandfather floors the gas pedal, Going way over the speed limit. "Shade Magiak was Sarok's son, Since we killed his father and sister, HE IS PISSED!!" says my Grandfather before we hear sirens behind us. "Aww FUCK!" says my grandfather before continuing to drive to keep Shade's car in his sight. "Uh...Mr Vinichi..." says Rain before we come only 8 yards from Shade's car. My grandfather draws a small pistol from his belt and shoots it out the window hitting Shade's car before they take a sharp right and we crash into a department store and into a few isles. "We have a problem" says my grandfather before the Officer walks up pointing a pistol. "Out of the car" he says and Rain sighs.
1111111111111111111111.title: Car Chase.

11111111111111111111111.content:
(Rain's point of view).
"Hello Wolfkin" says a human female covered in piercings and wearing biker clothing. "Listen, I don't know who..." she begins before I grab her by the hair and I smash her face into the bars knocking her out before I take a seat on the bench. "Fucking idiot" I say through the bars at Michael Vinichi before the doors open and I see a Colonel walking down the halls looking at us.


(Michael's point of view).
"What the hell were you doing?, Driving 70 miles an hour over the speed limit, Shooting at a fleeing pedestrian vehicle, DRIVING a car at 150mph and into a department store, What the fuck" says Andreas and I hand him my watch before he looks at it. "Tracking device? on what?!" he asks and I smile. "Shade Magiak's car" I say and he looks at me surprised. "Oh....That explains alot" he says and I nod. "Listen, I can get you all out of here, Once, But your not allowed back into this city for 90 days, So your off your current job, Your next job is to assassinate Shade Magiak" says Andreas and I nod. "Alright" I say before he walks away to get us all free'd.
11111111111111111111111.title: Jail.

111111111111111111111111.content:
(Alex's point of view).
"Your a fucking idiot you know that? I am already an outcast in the Wolfkin city, Id like to be considered a NORMAL Wolfkin in human society!!" screams Rain to my grandfather and he ignores her causing her to growl before storming off into the forest to cool down. "You could have answered her" says Teresa and my Grandfather shrugs. "If she wants to shout, Im not going to talk, if she will let me clean my gun and talk civilized then I will reply" he says and I sigh before walking out into the middle of the forest to find Rain.
111111111111111111111111.title: Anger.

1111111111111111111111111.content:
(Alex’s point of view)
“Rain!” I yell, trying to find her on account of her storming off and not telling me or anyone where she’s going. I stop and try to concentrate, seeing if I can hear anything out of the ordinary that tells me its Rain. I hear some shuffling noises a little ahead of me and I continue on to find her sitting on a large rock.

“There you are!” I say out loud and she doesn’t do anything, she just keeps staring into the sky and trees. She sighs and I climb up to her where I sit down next to her.

“Something up?” I ask her and she looks down.

“I’m glad you let me come along and try to help change my reputation because of my whore and bitch of a mother… but please, can we try to not do anything else to hurt all of us and what people think?” she asks and I wrap an arm around her waist to reassure her.

“No promises but I’ll do what I can.”I say and she smiles as she snuggles closer to me.

“Tell me… why did your dad send you and your sister with his dad on investigating these children’s disappearances?” she asks and I begin to wonder as well.

“You saw what my dad had become… no matter how messed up this world is, and no matter how much control one has in it, it’ll always be life scaring to most people. Maybe he thinks that sending me and my sister on this type of assignment will try to strengthen us for anything else this world has to offer.” I give my best answer and she smiles.

“Sounds like a smart man.” She says and I smile.

“He has too… he killed Nashton after all, and he managed to gain a truce to every species on this planet right?” I say.

“True.” She says. A few minutes pass before Rain looks at me and asks.

“Do you like me?” she asks and I look at her.

“Yeah I like you.” I say but I don’t think that’s what she meant.

“No I mean do you like like me?” she says.

“Oh, well… uhhhhh…” I begin but she interrupts.

“Since I’ve been with you, you’ve shown me compassion and have been nice to me, the only other person ever to do that was my father. I also like you Alex, but I want to know if you really like me.” she says and I think.

“Oh Rain, I-“ I begin to say but I hear something.

“Alex, what-“ she says but I shush her.

“Hold on I heard something.” I say and jump down onto the ground where I pull out my revolver and look around. I walk forward to try and find what made that sound. I quickly look behind some trees and I slowly check around but I find nothing. I holster my gun and begin walking back to her.

“Guess it was nothing.” I say before some kind of invisible force launches through the air and I hit a tree hard before I fall unconscious. Rain gasps at what happened and looks to the source of that. She sees two people come out of the shadows and they have the same clothing and features as people have reported seeing and the description that Alex’s father gave.

(Rain’s point of view)
The people in front of me are the ones I know of, the ones that I believe are the ones that kidnap children. I can’t see their faces because of their robes. I jump down onto the ground and get ready just in case.

“Rain Silvarz, we come to extend you an invitation to join us.” One of them says and I’m shocked.

“Why in the hell would I join you monsters?” I say and I hear them smirk.

“Because our main embodiment and goal is to do the will of our lord, and he wants everyone to suffer, to produce misery to any and everyone we know and find. You know of what it is to suffer, all your life, you were tormented, beaten and humiliated by your own kin and especially your mother. No one will truly love you for the actions you’ve taken and the people you’ve worked with. With us… we will give you a purpose and a chance to turn all that suffering you’ve been given and turn it into your own pleasure as you inflict it on others… and get your revenge on your bitch of a mother’s soul. Will you join us and become a family member of us?” he asks and the other answers.

“Don’t worry, if you join us, we will have lots of fun tormenting the souls of others, especially your mother’s.” the second voice says and I can tell its female. I think for about minute, the chance to get an eternity of revenge on my cunt of a mother is almost too go to be true… but do I really want to torment the lives of other innocents, just for the fun of it?

“I… wil-“ I begin but I hear a couple loud pops and they jerk a bit. I look to where I think they are shot from and see Alex standing with his revolver in one hand and his katana in the other.

(Alex’s point of view)
I managed to wake up from my forced sleep and I fired a shot in each of them. I run forward and I fire a few more shots at them but they jump out of the way and in the shadows of the forest around us.

“Rain, get out of here and get the others! I hold them off!” I yell to her and she freezes.

“Look out!” she yells and I bring my katana up and I deflect a slash from some kind of razor like whip. It bounces off and goes back.

“Go now!” I yell and fire more shots at where I think they are. I move away from Rain and I look around to try and find them but nothing. I then feel a presence behind me and I use adrenaline rush and I duck, a razor whip nearly cleaving my head and I throw into the person wielding it. I tackle him to the ground and I get up and pick him up and slam him into the tree. I pull out my sword and try to stab him but he disappears and I don’t know where he is. I quickly slash behind me but I find nothing. I look around to find them but still see Rain there.

“Rain! Goaaaaaaaaaaahh!” I yell as my words suddenly change to blinding pain as I feel something tear through the skin in my back. I crouch for a second from the pain before I look to the right and I see some claws come at my face, knocking me onto my back and leave four slash marks on the side of my face. I groan a bit and I open my eyes to see the both of them looking down at me before the guy kicks me in the side hard enough to make me roll against the rock I sat on before.

(Rain’s point of view)
Alex, the only other person besides my dad to show me compassion has just nearly risked his life to keep mine from another that could have just costed me much more. The one person… I love. I ready my claws as anger begins to course through every fiber of my being.

“Now that that nuisance is done, have you-“ the guy begins but he gets cut off as I tackle him to the ground and I begin clawing at his face, revealing him to be 22 with his skin pale but normal pale. He has a few barely noticeable scars on his face as well, but I begin to give him a whole lot more. After clawing at his face for a bit, I throw myself off him in another direction and tackle the girl. Her hood falls off to reveal a Chinese little girl with skin that is a grayish white. Her eyes are demonic red with 2 cat ears on the top of her head. She has short black hair and has veins on her face that are black. I claw at her face, hearing her squeal in pain as she tries to throw me off her. After I do some damage, something stops me then lifts me into the air throws off her into a tree. I look up and see a portal open up in front of the girl as the guy helps her up. She quickly goes in and the guy looks at me and points to me.

“You… have made a grave mistake, Rain Silvarz. You will regret it.” He says before disappearing into the portal. I sigh and I hear a groan before I quickly get up and go over to Alex. I turn him over and look at him.

“Alex! Are you alright!?” I quickly ask him but he just stares at me for a second. He brings both of his hands to either side of my face and I am confused for a second but instead am surprised when he forces my lips to his where he begins French kissing me like crazy, driving his tongue deep into my mouth as he can and rolling it against my tongue. I’m too stunned by this to return it but soon stops, a small trail of saliva connecting our mouths together.

“What… was that for?” I ask and he smiles.

“Rain… I do love you, and the way you went berserk on those two… made you look even more beautiful then I can ever imagine. He says and I smile as I wag my tail happily and my ears perk up. I accidently hug him a little more tightly and he groans from his wounds.

“C’mon, let’s get you back to camp and all patched.” I say and I help him up.

“Alright.” He says and we begin walking back to camp.

“I love you, Rain Silvarz.” He says and I smile.

“I love you too, Alex Vinichi.” I reply and he smiles.
1111111111111111111111111.title: Talking.

11111111111111111111111111.content: "Welcome back" says Michael before noticing Alex's cuts. "What happened?" he asks standing up and Alex smiles at me. "We ran into someone but Rain kicked there ass" he says smiling before Michael begins examining his wounds. "Rain can you do stitches?" asks Michael and I nod before he hands me a needle and thread and then begins walking off into the forest. "Where are you going?" I ask. "I am going to get antibiotics so that the...." begins Michael before looking down and seeing a giant bug crawling up his leg. "Gah!!" he says swatting it away.
