"Look at your Uncle, He is still battle ready and runs military tracks 3 times a day to stay in shape, Now look at your Mother, It would take her a good 3 weeks to charge into a battle again, She has gained a bit of weight from pregnancy, She has begun aging along with your father alot quicker and both your mother and father only go for a jog every second morning for an hour which by my calculations doesn't make them lose nearly enough weight or gain enough muscle, Your father hasn't worked for years due to his bonus from the Nashtonville war and all of this was caused by Love" she says and I shake my head. "My uncle is a hard ass War veteran who lost most of his soul from the Nashtonville war because the Overseer sent him to execute innocent people, Without my Mother and Fathers love I wouldn't be created and without love there would be no human race meaning no you" I say and she makes a beep noise that she makes whenever she is corrected. "Your right" she says and I nod. "But falling in Love with a Wolfkin is....frowned upon" she says and I shrug. "They can go fuck themselves if they don't like it, I love her" I say before she stands up and gives a bow. "Then I will respect it Alex-san" she says and I smile before she walks back to the camp.

(Rain's point of view).
"Rain Silvarz" says Centauri and I freeze before slowly turning around. "I am so very sorry for my assault" says Centauri. "Its...Ok" I say and she shakes her head. "My sensors indicate that you fear me, I am sorry" she says before going to sit at the fire and I give Alex a curious look and he shrugs.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Morning

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Alex's point of view).
"Centauri can you please get a fish for...." begins Rain before Centauri shoots into the sky and dives into the water. Me and Rain both look at each other before a fish flies out of the water and flies through the air before crashing down 4 feet from the fire and Centauri walks out of the water. the fish is about 30 pounds and is twitching around in the grass with its body jerks causing it to jump a bit. "Uh...thank you" says Rain before grabbing the fish and bashing its head over a rock before shoving a knife into its ass and cutting it open. "So how are my parent's?" I ask. "Concerned about you, Other than that fine" replies Centauri with her arms crossed before looking at the Vine bed. "Rain made that?" she asks and I nod. "Smart, Over Huk tree roots, under Huk tree leafs, Covered in the natural repellent of a Huk tree, meaning no danger of insects..." says Centauri and I see Rain wag her tail. "How far to the nearest town or city?" I ask and she makes another beep noise. "30 Miles" she says and I think before looking at the Vine bed. "Centauri, I have an Idea" I say and she gives me a curious look before I sit down at the camp fire where Rain is beginning to cook the food.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Food.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: "Mystuuyaka....What does that mean?" I ask Rain and she shrugs. "Mystuuyaka was a Human attempt at a Wolfkin name" says Centauri walking beside us with her hands behind her back. "Excuse me, Are you Centauri?" asks a man wearing a business suit. "No, I am Alex-San's personal bodyguard designed as the ex body guard for the Overseer of the government of Earth 1 and Earth 2 Alliance" says Centauri with a simplistic robotic voice and he nods before walking away. "Why did you lie?" asks Rain. "If I went around and told everyone that I was Centauri I would gain unwanted attention" says Centauri before Rain points to a club and wags her tail. "Lets go in there" she says and I smile before Centauri sighs. "I will get a Hotel room for the two of you using your fathers account, I will notify him and I will come and find the two of you in 6 hours" says Centauri and I smile. "Alright see you in 6" I say before Rain leads me inside the club.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Mystuuyaka

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Rain's point of view).
"Hey, Wolfkin, Wan't to play 5 finger Fillet?" asks a overweight human with a bald head and pale green eyes. I smile at him and I nod before he leads me and Alex to a table with a young Asian human sitting on the opposite end. He has short black hair and a tattoo on his face and is dressed in a white t-shirt. "Rain, This isn't a smart Idea" says Alex and I shush him by pressing my lips to his and forcing my tongue into his mouth in a passionate kiss. "100 Dollars!" I say slamming a 100$ bill on the table for my bet and the asian man puts down 1,000 dollars for his before handing me a razor sharp dagger. "You go first Wolfkin" says the bald head man and I smile before starting off slow. I jab the knife inbetween my spread out fingers at a steady pace before slowly beginning to speed up. I can tell Alex is tense expecting me to cut my fingers off any second now. Within 2 minutes I am going full speed hitting the table two times a second and I look up from the table with a smile before the bald man shouts "Time!" and I stop before sliding the dagger across the table to the Asian man. "Your turn" I say and he takes it before beginning to jab the table between his fingers. He picks up and after about a minute and a half I can tell he is trying to be faster than me, But what he doesn't know is that I have been doing five finger fillet since I was 8. He brings the dagger down a final time and his scream is heard across the bar causing people to turn around and I smile at the sight of his middle finger 3 inches from his hand. "GAH FUCK!!" he yells before I grab his bet and I smile at Alex who is gawking at me. "Want to dance?" I ask and he nods happily.

(Alex's point of view).
Rain leads me out onto the Dance floor that is currently full of Single people and couples of all ages dancing to a hip hop/Electronica song and Rain smiles at me before letting go of my hands and beginning to club dance and I smile before dancing myself close to her. After a few minutes Rain pushes her back up against my chest and brings my arms around to her hips and I smile before beginning to caress her while we both move around. I move my hands up from her belt and I run then up under her shirt and I feel her soft obsidian fur in my hands. "Rain!?!" asks a Voice and me and Rain are knocked out of our lala world to see a Male Wolfkin standing there wearing a Jacket like Rain. "Do I know you?" asks Rain. "I am a Major serving your father" he says and Rain looks at me before him. "Prove it" says Rain and the Wolfkin begins saying some kind of oath in Wolfkin. "Oh...follow us" says Rain beginning to lead us out of the Nightclub to talk.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: an unexpected visitor.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: "So....is this a friend of yours?" asks the Wolfkin looking at me and Rain shakes her head. "He is my mate" she says and the Wolfkin gawks at her in shock. "You....with a Human?" asks the Wolfkin and she nods. "But....Why?" he asks. "He accepts me for me and shows me Love and compassion every minute of every day and he isn't a pervert" says Rain looking at the Wolfkin at the last part of her sentence and he lowers his ears and I smile. "But....Its against our Religion...." begins the Wolfkin and Centauri corrects him. "Actually, Your religion founder Zabathuur stated in your historical scriptures that you should marry the one you love, It NEVER states that you cannot marry someone of another species, Wolfkin today bend there religion to make sure Wolfkin never mate with Sakia, Zugot or humans, When actually wolfkin are free to do, You just have to know the religion well enough" says Centauri and he growls at her. "Notify my father that I will come and see him as soon as possible" says Rain and he nods before getting ready to leave.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Hotel.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: Today Father began teaching me how to eat with sticks. Its very hard to hold them properly and make them move for me but I know i will understand them soon enough. General Ky-Shura notified my father that another wall is being built along the borders to keep out bad people like the Mongolians trying to invade. I began hearing a mans voice calling me in my head earlier today and I asked my father about it, He thought I was joking around but its beginning to scare me. He tells me that I must help him lead people to suffer. But why?, I've told him to leave me alone but he does not listen. He tells me that my soul is innocent and must be changed, and that I must use my innocence to cause suffering, But I don't know what he means by that. I hope he leaves me alone because if I ever find out who it is ill have my father send soldiers to chop his head off.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Kia's Diary page 1: Voices.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Venomous' point of view).
"Help me open thissss up" I say to my son before he grabs the bars on the door with me and we begin pulling on it till we hear a very loud rustic creak from it and then it opens revealing frozen corpses scattered around the wreckage and a Radiation gun on the ground. It is a cannon like gun that you wield on your shoulder. Its black with a pointed tip with 3 arms on the end that spin while it charges. While it charges the small arms at the tip glow red and then when you pull the trigger the tip fires a beam of pure radiation at what ever your shooting at. It burns through flesh like butter and it rips through vehicles like glass. I grab hold of it and I pick it up to see how much it weighs and since its an old model it weighs about 50 pounds. "Holy crap" I say before walking outside of the helicopter and I put it down on the ground. "What the hell are we gonna do now?" asks my son and I pull his cell phone out of his pocket before dialing the operator. "Operator how may I help you?" asks the operator. "We found ssssome E1 Government technology and would like a Government sssship to come collect it pleassse" I say. "where are you located?" she asks. "Trace the call" I say before putting the phone down and sitting on a large rock.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Deadly weapon.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Rain's point of view).
"Rain!" says my father and I wag my tail before hugging him tightly and he lifts me off the ground. "father" I say happily before my father looks at Alex and Centauri standing there and he looks at me curiously. My father has obsidian fur like me but red eyes. He stand 8 feet tall and has large muscles that he has spent his life making in battlefields and training. His muzzle is scarred up and his left ear is half gone. He is wearing a pair of camo pants and a General's jacket with a shotgun on his back. "Who are these two?" he asks looking at Alex and Centauri. "Wait...., That is Centauri, isn't it?" he asks and I nod. "Please, Come in" says my father pointing to the cave entrance that is actually a whole network of caves running underground. "Alright" I say following him downstairs.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Father and Daughter

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
I woke up today and found myself not in my room. Instead I woke up laying down in black grass in some kind of field with the sky grey, the sun black and all the tree's in the area dead. I wasn't wearing my normal clothing either. I found myself wearing a black robe that had a white spike styled trim. A man said hello to me and I turned around to find a man standing there with blood red eyes full of sorrow and hatred. He told me it was time to become what I am suppose to become. I told him that I was the emperor's daughter and that he should release me immediately. That was a bad idea. Black metal string with razor sharp blades all over it shot out of the ground all around me before wrapping tightly around my arms and legs before they lifted me off the ground and spun around trapping me in a sharp hooked cocoon. I screamed and begged him to release me as the wire slowly moved around and sliced into my body drawing blood easier than a soldiers sword. He asked me why he should let me go when I was making threats towards him. He laughed at me when I urinated myself from the pain and then he made the metal string wrap around my face.

This went on for two weeks. While I was in the Cocoon of Razor wire as he called it, It changed me. it gave me sharp teeth, the ears of a cat, Cat paws instead of my feet and hands, A cat tail, Cat eyes and it also gave me long steel blades instead of finger nails. He told me the name Salitar for his name but I was to refer to him as Lord Suffer. I yelled and screamed at him to change me back and all he did was laugh before telling me that this is how I would be from now on. I told him I wanted to never see him again and all he did was smile before saying that I could go back to my family if I wished but that I should not expect them to accept me for what I was.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Kia's diary page 2

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Alex's point of view).
"So you killed your mother?" asks Rain's father and Rain nods. "I had to, She tried to kill me" says Rain and he leans back in thought. The 4 of us are sitting at a table inside a room made out of stone. We are 50 feet below the forest floor and the entire place is dimly lit by old lights on the wall that flicker sometimes. "That is understandable Rain, However why are these two with you?" asks Rain's father and Rain thinks. "Well father....Alex is my Mate" says Rain and he stares at her before slowly looking at me. "Im in love with him father, I even let him take my virginity" she says and I know now that he's gonna kill me. "YOU LITTLE!!..." he begins yelling after jumping up but stops when Centauri's laser sword points to his neck. "Touch him, I kill you and order the entire Earth 1 army to march on your hideout" says Centauri and he sits down before she snaps her wrist and her sword folds up. "Rain....Why?!" asks Rain's father. "He loves me for me, Not just my looks but for me, All the Wolfkin I know only want to fuck me, Alex actually will spend time with me and he listens to me" replies Rain and he thinks for a moment. "Fine, But I want him to prove himself to me" says her father before looking at me and I am curious what he has planned.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: News.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
"Here" says Rain's father handing me a knife and I look at it before him. "If you truly love my daughter, Carve her name into your chest without screaming or crying" he says and I think he is joking for a sec before I see his face. "Alex you don't...." begins Rain but I pick up the knife and I take my shirt off. "Alright" I say before taking the knife and he stops me. "Make it so her name will always be there" he says before I begin carving the R. I grit my teeth and I close my eyes tight while my breathing becomes nothing but struggled gasps as I cut the knife down to make the first line of the R. I finish the first line and now for the hard part, The half circle to make it a P and then another line to make it an R. Blood now has bled down my torso and to my belt. I finish the R and I take a deep breath before Rain's father smiles. "Very Nice, Now all you have left to do is the rest and then her last name" he says and I feel like taking this knife and stabbing him in the throat but I know I can't so I continue.

an hour and a half later.......

I carve the final line of the Z in her name and I stab the knife into the table with my hands shaking. "There!" I say and he smiles. "That was impressive, You are free to explore our fortress with Rain" he says before standing up and leaving after giving Rain a hug. When he leaves Rain runs over to me and hugs me. "Im sorry he made you do that" she says and I smile. "Its alright, Its kind of like a tattoo, except this one hurts alot more" I say and she smiles.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Test

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Rain's point of view).
I can't believe my father made Alex do that, But surprisingly Alex is not very pissed off by it, But I can tell it hurts. "So what is this?" asks Alex after we take our seats. "It looks like a Death Match" says Centauri and she got it right. "Bingo, This is how females usually choose a mate, They pick the champion and then go and get fucked" I say and Alex smiles before putting his hand on my thigh and I wag my tail. "Are there any rules?" asks Centauri and I shake my head. "Nope, If a guy surrenders you have the option to let him live or kill him" I reply before the show starts. The Death match room is a wide open room with benches set up all around the ring which is closed off by a few boards nailed to posts. The matches begin and me and Alex begin watching 2 Wolfkin fighting against each other but neither of us don't find it very exciting.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Entertainment.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Alex's point of view).
"I will make sure no one disturbs your sleep" says Centauri before leaning against the wall a few feet outside our room. "Thanks, Hows your battery?" I ask. "72.4%" she says before looking at me. "Guddonaitoarekkusu-san (Good night, Mr. Alex)" she says before turning on Sleep mode. Guddonaitoarekkusu-san is the only sentence in Japanese I know. Centauri has said it to me since I was 4 when ever she was the one putting me to bed. Centauri was interesting to me when I was a kid. I would always try to annoy her but she would never act annoyed, Instead she would just grab me and handcuff me to the staircase if I misbehaved and then put a gag in my mouth to make me shut up, With my mothers permission of course. I also tried playing Hide and go seek with her but she turned on some kind of X-ray mode and found me in 5.3 seconds. Im surprised she isn't bored with the job. I close the door behind me and Rain before she begins taking off her clothing for bed time and I do the same. The bed is a vine bed like the one we had in the forest except it is covered in furs and sheets for much better comfort. Rain climbs ontop of them and pulls a very thin white bed sheet that I know is either Zugot or Human made and I get under with her before puling her back against my body and I hug her tightly and her tail wags slowly. Her fur is nice and warm and incredibly soft. "Good Night" I say but I notice she has already fallen asleep and I smile before closing my eyes to fall asleep.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: bed time.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Kia's point of view).
I sigh while looking at the walls my fathers men built thousands of years ago before he forsaken'd me. My father never believed I was his daughter when I returned to him. He called me a Demon and ordered his guards to execute me. I escaped and Ran back to Lord Suffer eventually and he took me in and told me he was my new father, My father of Suffering. After I joined a teenager from Portugal joined in 6,234 AD named Zaros who saw his parents massacred because his family were Necromancers. After him came a girl who was raped and beaten to death named Kora in 9,452. After her came Relinquish, an Alchemist who was suspected of Devil worship and was burned at the stake in 11,453. After him came Cloud, A english archer who murdered his parents. Finally came Mausso in 1792. After him came Scar, A Shutzstaffel officer who was killed by a Riot of Jewish people in a concentration camp. Finally we found Didra, A Woman from Saudi Arabia who was stoned to death after being accused of murdering her husband and children. To join our Ranks we need those who suffer but are not obsessed over it. If someone is constantly on the ground sobbing with a bottle of alcohol in there hands there is not a shot in hell. If you are someone who suffers on the inside but it doesn't consume there life we accept them into our ranks, It cant just be a one time thing, They need to suffer there entire lives over something. For example Mausso had is heart broken by a woman he wanted to be his wife 5 days before he was killed, Also all his child hood he was abused by his father and made fun of every day by children. Scar suffered because people always broke his heart because of a horrible scar he got from his father on his face. I am the only one who did not have a life of suffering. I was the Emperor of China's daughter back when the Great Wall of China was being built. Zaros, Kora, Scar and Relinquish tried taking over the Suffer realm a few hundred years ago and it lead to them being Banished. "Nǎlǐ shì nǐ de fùmǔ xiǎo nǚhái? (Where are your parents little girl?)" asks a Chinese soldier wearing a Lieutenants jacket for the Government. "Tāmen qù huòdé yǐnliào (They went to get drinks)" I reply to him and he nods before walking over to socialize with 2 other soldiers. My claws are hidden inside my paws so that I don't get unwanted attention and I am wearing a hoody on my head with a pair of blue jeans to make myself look like a Anime fan from my cat ears, eyes, paws and tail. "Hello Kia" says a familiar voice and I look over my shoulder to see Relinquish standing there wearing a black robe with a purple trim and wrapped in purple razor wire. Zaros' followers all wear different kinds of robes, For example Relinquish dresses much different from Zaros since Zaros' robes glow. Relinquish does not scare me at all, His power is far weaker than mine, He is childish and Zaros actually hates the guy. Zaros however I would have a problem with, He could possibly even kill my soul meaning I would become nothing, Kind of like how Atheists think happens when you die. Relinquish only got his power because Lord Suffer found his begging amusing. "Hello Traitor" I say looking at his face. Relinquish has short black hair along with black dead eyes and a Black metallic eye on his forehead that allows him to read people's minds, I know because it was mine and I gave it to him for a reward for bringing in Scar. "So how is this going to work are...." I begin before an invisible force grabs me and smashes me into the stone wall. "Thought so" I say.

I make my claws come out of my paws before I use my power to transform myself back into my robes and my use a cloaking spell to hide my face. "Nǐ fànle yīgè kě pà de cuòwù (You have made a terrible mistake)" I say while levitating with my arms spread out. Tourists and other citizens notice the two of us and begin running while the soldiers grab there guns. "I have no Idea what you just said, Nor do I care, After I steel your soul im going to...." he begins and I lose interest after that. I lay back while levitating to look up at the sky while he goes on a huge rant on how he is going to hang me by my intestines etc etc etc. He finishes after about 3 minutes which is amazing that it took him that long. I smile before thrusting my claws up into the air causing Razor wire to shoot out of the ground and wrap around him before throwing him through the air towards me and I float to the side two feet before I make my claws glow green and I stab them into him causing him to glow green and then teleport away. I teleported him to the Moon.

2 hours later.....


(Timothy's point of view).

"Hello Timothy" says Kia to me and I look up at her in the pitch black room to see two glowing red demonic eyes. "Are you sad again Timothy?" she asks me and I don't look back up at her again. She destroyed Father Patrovi, A man of God and she made him into....some kind of horrible beast. "Get away from me demon!" I shout to her and she smiles. "You were such a fun boy to play with, Its still me Timothy, I gave you hugs to make you feel better" she says and I try to throw a stone at her but it flies through her as if she was just a hologram. "YOU LIED!!, You told me Father Patrovi was OK!, But it hurt even more that you!, My only friend left betrayed me!!" I scream at her and she giggles evilly. "Oh innocent little Timothy, That was the whole point of this, To break your heart and fill you with sorrow and betrayal" she says to me before her eyes disappear and I look around for her before I feel her arms wrap around me from behind and I feel her claws across my chest and her head rested on my shoulder. Her claws smell like fresh blood and her breath stinks of the same irony stench. "I can give you anything Timothy, you just have to accept the sorrow, Let go of your faith and beliefs and believe in reality, This....Is reality, Tell me Timothy, What do you want?, Your in your 20's, I can get you Woman, Slaves......Power" she says before I feel her tongue lick up my cheek to taste my tears. "Your sorrow is so lovely, You might even be able to join our ranks, Mausso would love to have a new apprentice and you would be able to meet our Lord, Salitar" she says and I turn my head to look into her eyes. "Burn in hell" I say and she giggles. "Go ahead Timothy, Follow your faith, But Remember Little Timothy, I can wait for Eternity" she says before she is gone.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Kia vs Relinquish.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Alex's point of view).
The sky, ground and tree's are grey in all directions. "Rain!, Centauri!" I shout looking around before I walk up a hill and I gawk at the field infront of me. Sitting in the fetal position are thousands of children with grey skin and wearing nothing but rags. They all range between 4 and 11 of age and they all have there faces hidden. I begin walking down one of the isles of the children and I keep walking while looking at all of them.

I walk for about 40 minutes till in all directions there are endless lines of children. "Hello?" I say before all the children in synchronization look up at the sky causing me to jump back because they no longer have eyes. There eye sockets are dripping black blood and they also have black lips and black veins. There heads all turn to me in all directions the ones infront of me having there heads turn around completely and I freeze. "His name is Salitar, Lord of Suffering, His name is Salitari, Lord of Suffering...." they say repeating the sentence over and over at the same time and each time it begins getting louder and louder. "SHUT UP!!" I yell closing my eyes and covering my ears and it stops immediately. I open my eyes and I find all the children to be gone. "W...what the fuck" I say looking around in all directions. I sigh before turning around to see Rain standing there. "RAIN!, What are you doing here?!" I ask and she smiles at me. "Im sorry for coming Alex" she says and I am confused before she pulls out some kind of wire like cable. "You cannot save me Alex" she says before taking the cable and biting down on it before the cable yanks upwards and it rips her head off. "RAIN!!!" I scream before I look away and I find myself now in a gymnasium. "Curiosity killed the cat, curiosity killed the cat..." says a female voice and I turn around to see my Sister Teresa standing over a dead Zugot holding a board with nails in it. "HAHAHA!!! Curiosity Killed the cat!!" she says before her face begins melting "CURIOSITY KILLED THE CAT!!!" she screams. "SHUT UP!!" I scream now tears running down my face before I find myself back in the field. No children, No Rain but I sense someone behind me. I turn around just before a face made out of shadows comes right up to mine. It has red pointed eyes and a sharp mouth glowing blood red and it screams in my face and I scream in terror. "DON'T FIND THE CHILDREN OF SUFFER!!!!" it screams before fire ignites from its jaws sending flames at my face and I scream in agony.

I sit up while screaming in bed and Rain is sitting up in less than 5 seconds and Centauri kicks the door off the hinges. "Whats Wrong?!" asks Rain looking concerned and I breath heavily in a cold sweat. "Oh my god....." I say before I reach over and I lightly grab Rain's ear before feeling her neck and muzzle. "Are you ok Alex?" she asks and I look at Centauri before collapsing back onto the bed. "What a fucking Nightmare....Holy shit" I say before getting out of bed. "Time?" I ask Centauri. "7 am, I was about to wake the two of you up" she says and I sigh before looking at Rain. "Ill....tell you over breakfast" I say and she nods before I put on my jeans and shirt and I walk out of the room needing some fresh air.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Nightmare.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
"So...., There were all these children in a field saying His name is Salitar, Lord of Suffering and then I killed myself?" asks Rain and I shrug. "I don't know, all i remember seeing was your head getting ripped the fuck off your shoulders, my sisters face melting and some demon thing burning my face off" I reply before taking a big piece of steak and eating it. "Did you take a hit of LSD before bed or something?" she asks and I shake my head before Centauri puts a laptop on the table infront of me on a information website and in big letters on the top it says SALITAR.

"Salitar is the name of the Deity of Suffering in a Ancient Religion called Shovashkin, Salitar was thought to have been born Human but raised by Demons who worshiped suffering. Salitar gained Demonic powers and became a god to thousands of people. This Religion was Lost after the time of Christ and was erased from history by the Catholic church till 2640" I read out loud before I click the link Shovashkin. "Shovashkin is a Cult devoted to Sacrifice, Torture, Bondage and other examples of pain and sorrow. The main Deity is Salitar, A Demon Child and founder of the Religion. Shovashkin has sub deities as well. Kia the Sorrowful, Zaros the Lost, Kora the Defiled, Mausso the Tainted, Scar the Corrupt, Relinquish the betrayed, Didra the Lier. Shovashkin was erased from history due to the cruelty of the religion. Knights of the Catholic church hunted Shovashkin members for centuries hoping to destroy the religion. Not much is known on Shovashkin since there members are very limited" I read before Rain closes the laptop. "Your freaking me out" she says and I smile before continuing to eat breakfast. "Your sister and grandfather shall be here shortly" says Centauri and I smile. "excellent" I say before shoving a piece of steak into my mouth.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Breakfast.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: "This place smells like a Dog" says my Sister sitting down at the table before looking at the Rain. "Sorry..." says my sister and Rain silently growls. "I really hope you two don't become mortal enemies that hate each other, because if that is the case then Christmas will be hell" I say and they both smile. "So, whats the plan now?" asks Teresa and I shrug. "I guess we should go see Mother and Father and say hello" I say and she nods before looking at Rain. "If they haven't found out about her and you yet it will be a pretty big shock" she says. "Grandpa told father I think" I say and Rain wags her tail. "Great we will head out in 2 days" says Rain and I smile. "That sounds good" says Centauri handing me a can of Arctic breeze and I open it.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: plans.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Rain's point of view).
"Rain, May I speak to you privately?" asks my father and I tell Alex ill be back in a few minutes before standing up and following him down the halls. "Where we going?" I ask happily and he gives me a smile. "Were gonna get our pictures taken and then I have a little present for you" he says and I wag my tail.

20 minutes later.....

"Sut Chafk (say Cheese)" says the Photographer before taking the photo causing the flash to stun both me and my father for a few seconds. "Ow" I say rubbing my eyes before I hear a click and then a photo is handed to me showing me and my father standing beside each other smiling and I smile happily. "Now time for your presents" says my father before leading me down the halls to his room.

Inside his room I find a female Wolfkin still asleep in his bed and I give him a questioning look. "Well, Since your mother is gone I...." he begins but I stop him. "Its ok father, Mom was a bitch" I say and he nods slowly before giving me a hug and I hug him back. "Oh hello, You must be Rakia" says the female Wolfkin sitting up and I nod. Rakia means Rain in Wolfkin so my Wolfkin name is the same as my english name technically. "Yes" I say smiling. "Id stand up and greet you but...." she says before looking down at the blankets covering her shoulders down. "I understand" I say before my father walks over to the wall and he opens up a glass casing that has a sword in it. He hands it to me and I pull it out of its sheath to look at it. Its a Samik which has a similar design to a Japanese Katana. Its blade is black and its handle is also black. The hilt guard is an X shape with the blade and hilt meeting in the center of the X. In the middle of the hilt on both sides is a Silver sign that I recognize as the Silvarz family symbol. The sheath is black and has the symbol on it as well. "That is your families sword, It has been in our family for 400 years, Far before humans ever arrived" he says and I smile. "Thank you" I say and he smiles before handing me a bow made out of Rare Trofk wood. Trofk tree's are the rarest tree on Earth 2, There is only 1 Trofk forest and its small compared to the giant Huk tree forests. Trofk tree's get there color because they have a black oil inside there bark and wood. In the ancient Wolfkin scriptures during the time of Zabathuur him and his army set a Trofk forest on fire killing thousands of Sakia soldiers in less than 30 minutes. The bow looks well made and with it comes a Trofk quiver full of Trofk arrows. "This was my bow, Now it is yours" he says and I wag my tail. "Thank you father" I say before he begins tieing it onto my back and then he ties the sword onto my left hip. "We should return to the others" he says and I nod before we walk back to talk with the others.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Family Weapons.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
"I got us the train tickets" says Michael before handing me a ticket and then Handing Teresa and Alex one. "The train will be here in an hour, Don't be late" says Centauri before handing each of us a pill. "This is a tracking device, swallow them so that I can come get you if you are not here 5 minutes early" says Centauri before I swallow it and then Alex leads me over to a restaurant for some food.

(Didra's point of view).
"Didra why do you still wear the Aqib and Abaya?, You don't live in Saudi Arabia anymore" asks Kia appearing out of nowhere beside me and I turn my head to her. "Is there something I can do for you Kia?" I ask and she nods. "Destroy the bridge inbetween Ka'tustroth and mustok on Earth 2 in the Durbik district in exactly 2 hours" she says and I think. "Lord Suffer wishes for it to be destroyed, I am not sure why" she says and I nod. "It will be done" I say and she giggles. "excellent" she says before in a blink she is gone.

1 hour and 58 minutes later....

"OH Lord Suffer you Genius" I say pacing back and forth underneath a a bridge meant for a train. "How so very lovely this should be" I say before walking over to the main support and I take out my scimitar. I use the tip of the blade to begin carving a symbol into the concrete supports. "Perdere hoc petram" I say before my symbol glows dark purple and then explodes the entire concrete support. "Beautiful" I say before I teleport to the top to watch the crash.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Rigged to crash

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Alex's point of view).
I wrap my arm around Rain and I smile at her and she smiles back before My sister stands up from her chair. "Im gonna go to the bar and see if they have soda" she says and I nod before lifting up my hand in a gestured wave and she begins walking down the car before exiting the car. "I think we should...." begins my grandfather before the Train all of a suddenly jerks forward on a down angle and I fall out of my seat along with Rain and I smash my head against Centauri's before I grab onto a seat and Rain grabs onto one below me. Screams erupt from all over the train car as people fall and try to grab hold of seats but some fall all the way to the bottom. The Train falls forward even more as what I guess is more of the bridge collapsing and the entire car turns vertical causing me to fall down a few more set of cars but I manage to grab hold of Rain's paws which cause her to yelp for a second and whimper as she almost loses her grip. "What the hell!?!" I yell before a man falls from above and crashes against a few seats before hitting the ground which use to be a wall and blood begins to puddle around him. "I love you" I say up to Rain and her tail wags. "I love you too" she says before the Train begins to drop and everyone screams before the seat is yanked from Rain's hands and then we fall before some how the gravity changed and we crash into the glass of the windows and I fall unconscious.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Train Crash

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: I slowly open my eyes to find my head being hugged by a whimpering Rain. I look up at her and her ears perk up before she wraps her arms tightly around me. "YOUR ALRIGHT!" She screams practically choking me from how tightly she hugs me. Just now I notice her head bandaged up along with mine and her coat is a bit ripped up. "What happened?" I ask. "The bridge was destroyed and we went over the edge, The Government is here but...." she begins but lowers her ears. "What?" I ask. "They can't find Teresa" she says and I sit up. "What do you mean?" I ask. "I mean, They have looked through the entire wreckage and they can't find her" she says before I stand up and I begin running around. The entire space between the two mountains we are between is rock. Its a greyish black stone and is hard. "TERESA!!" I yell beginning to run around to try to find her but I get dizzy and I collapse. "Alex!" says Rain running up to me and helping me up worry in her eyes and I know I have to sit down and calm down. "Just relax Alex, Centauri is looking for her right now, Please just calm down" says Rain and I nod before looking at the crash and it doesn't even look like a dam train anymore. "Fuck" I say angry that my sister might be dead.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: wreck.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Didra's point of view).
"Who.....Are...you?" asks the girl I have been dragging across the ground for the past hour. "I am part of the Children of Suffer girl, My name is Didra" I reply before I hear rockets and then a Robot lands infront of me pointing a laser sword at me. "You are under arrest by the..." she begins before I flick my wrist and she soars through the year into the cliff side. She recovers quickly and then looks me up and down. "How....Did you do that?" she asks before I lift her up off the ground and I smash her against the wall with my power multiple times and then I smash her into the ground. "Your Robot brain is probably having a little spasm wondering how it is possible that I can lift you up in the air when I am 30 feet away" I say before she charges towards me with her laser sword out and I smile. She brings her arm back and I lift the girl up at the last second causing the robot to slice her throat open and I laugh as the girls blood sprays all over the robots face. I throw the girl into the robot knocking it over before I open the portal to the Suffer realm and I walk into it.

(Centauri's point of view).
Teresa begins making a gurgling noise while she begins drowning in her own blood and I sigh knowing she is going to Die. "Teresa....I am sorry.....I have failed you.....Pray to your god if you believe in that" I say and tears run down her cheeks while blood gushes out of her neck. I position my hands in the proper positions before I let out another sigh and then I snap her neck to make sure she doesn't suffer any longer. I look up to see Alex turn the corner and he see's me holding his sister's lifeless body and I can tell by looking at his eyes that this will stick with him for the rest of his life. "TERESA!!!!" he screams tears running down his eyes before he reaches me and her and he takes her from me. "Im sorry" I say standing up and he cries into her blood covered shoulder. "WHO DID THIS?!?!" he screams at me looking into my lenses and I sigh. "I did it, Not on purpose....But I did it...." I say and he stairs at me with mixed emotions.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Prize.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Alex's point of view).
"YOU BITCH!!!!!" I scream at Centauri before I put my sister's corpse down and then I charge towards her. My body smashes into hers and I feel a sharp pain in my shoulder from the force required to take her down. I bring my fist up and I bring it down as hard as I can shattering her left lens revealing her fragile robotic eyes but I also feel the sharp pain in my hand as the glass stabs into my fingers. I fall down onto Centauri crying and I smash my fist down against her a few more times even though it does absolutely nothing.

45 minutes later....

"Alex I..." begins Centauri. "Shut up!" I say sharply while Rain wraps up my sisters body in a blanket found in the train crash. "Alex...." begins Rain but I stop her. "Not now Rain, Not now" I say firmly and she looks hurt so I apologize. "Im...sorry..." I say to her and she nods before Centauri stands up and leans against the wall a few pieces of her lens still there. I could easily kill her right now by sending a bullet through her eye but I won't this minute. "Centauri, Show me....what the fuck happened" I say and she nods before using her eye to display a screen on the wall to show her memory. It shows a Woman wearing one of those black middle east robes and veil using similar magic as Kia and Mausso and she uses Teresa to make Centauri kill her and then it shows my sisters last seconds and I shake my head slowly. "Centauri....Its not your fault.....But fuck up like that again, I will make sure you are killed.....slowly" I say before standing up. "Were finding Kia, We need to end this" I say before looking at Centauri. "Where is my grandfather?" I ask. "He is at the next city, He doesn't know the news yet" says Centauri and I sigh.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Rage.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
"Excuse me Ma'am, The Earth 1 Government needs your house please" says Centauri showing her government identification and the Woman looks surprised. "What do you mean you need my house?!" she asks. "We need it, Grab what you need and go to your mothers house or Be arrested" says Centauri and the woman runs back inside to grab her kids and then clothing and photo's. Centauri had a cab ready for her and the family gets in before Centauri walks in and looks around. "Alright, Get to work on setting up the photo's" I say before Rain begins setting them up. "Why did the family so easily move out of there house?" asks Rain. "Because the Government is like a tyrant, If you piss them off your dragged off in the middle of the Night and slaughtered on the charge of Terrorism" I reply and she looks up before looking at Centauri. "Thats terrorism right there" says Rain and Centauri shakes her head. "We have stepped up security, If you disobey the government then we suspect you are doing something wrong, So we kill you to make sure there is no threat" says Centauri and Rain shakes head. "Thats the kind of thing that starts rebellions Centauri" says Rain putting down a photo and then I begin searching the house for a computer.

I find the computer and I type down in the search bar Kia the Sorrowful before clicking on a link to the same site I was on a few days ago and I begin reading the page.

Kia the Sorrowful, Kia for short is the second most followed Deity in the cult of Shovashkin. In the Shovashkin scriptures it says Kia was once the daughter of the Emperor of China during the era that the great wall of china was being built. From what the story tells about her she began hearing voices of a man in her head telling her that she must suffer. Salitar tricked Kia and turned her into what people say is a cat girl. The Shovashkin cult believe Kia steals children in there bedrooms for Salitari, usually while the parents are distracted in a certain way that they cannot hear there child scream.

I finish ready and I scroll down to see a hand drawn picture of Kia floating inside a bedroom with the only colored part being her glowing red eyes. "I know how to get her!" I shout to everyone else in the other room.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Trap plan

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Kia's point of view).

"We need another 30 children" says Lord Suffer and I gawk at him. "By when?" I ask. "By thursday" he says and I let out an annoyed sigh. "Do I have to whip you Kia?" he asks and I shake my head. "Ill do it....Just a pain in the ass" I say since its Tuesday. "Just do it!" he shouts and I lower my ears before teleporting away.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Objective.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Alex's point of view).
"Dammit, She didn't come" I say turning our android child off and Rain shrugs before beginning to undress. "What the hell are you doing?" I ask before she crawls into a pair of light blue pajama's covered in teddy bear faces and then she puts on a matching pajama shirt. "What? Its the only thing they had" she says and I chuckle before hugging her. "well they are soft" I say I say before giving her a kiss and then she walks out to go to bed. "You little fucker!" I say to the shut down android before sighing. "Now your taking your shit out on a robot Alex" I say before going to take a nap with Rain and hopefully some fun but I doubt it.

9 hours later....

I didn't get the fun. When I reached up her shirt to try to arouse her she snarled at me so I went to bed. "Im sorry if...." I begin to apologize to Rain but she stops me. "Alex its fine, I was angry because I was tired" she says and I nod before I turn on the android. "Alright, Lets see if this works" I say before we go downstairs. I click the security camera's on the computer and then Centauri cranks up the music and noises of people talking to make it sound like a party downstairs and then I turn my attention to the camera's.

(Kia's point of view).
I walk through the portal into the little girls closet and I smile before I use my magic to turn the door nob and I then lightly push the closet door open. "Hello little Samantha" I say walking slowly to the little girl who is hiding underneath her blankets. "You don't have to fear me, I won't hurt you" I say before I reach her head and I grab the covers before ripping them away from her face before I point my claws at her face but her eye glow red. "What the..." I begin before laser beams shoot out of her eyes and get my directly in the face. I fall down onto the ground holding my face and screaming before I jump up after healing my face. "Kia!" says Alex Vinichi and I turn to see him charging. "You little!..." I begin before he grabs me and tackles me out the bedroom window.

(Alex's point of view).
"Nǐ zhège húndàn!!" shouts Kia when we hit the ground before I roll off her just in time as her claws shoot out and stab into the wall of the house. I draw my sword to her and she shrinks her claws to normal and then she gets in a fighting stance. "Come on Mortal, Give me your best shot!" shouts Kia before I charge towards her and she appears behind me before I hear her jumping up and slashing my back. I collapse down onto my knee before I bring my fist back with my sword hilt and I smash it into her face. "Tìdāo rèn" she says before razor wire shoots out of the ground and tries to wrap around me. I dodge it by jumping to the left and then I run up to her and I kick her in the face stumbling her before Centauri jumps through the window and lands beside Kia. "Come on robot!" says Kia before her claws lengthen quickly to stab Centauri but she jumps over them and then runs up to Kia before grabbing both her paws and then her claws and then she rips her claws out causing Kia's paws to begin gushing blood. Kia screams before Centaur grabs one of her claws off the ground and stabs her in the gut. "Don't kill her!" I shout to Centauri and she stops before I approach Kia.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Fighting Kia.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: "Gǒupì" says Kia and I look at Centauri. "What did she say?" I ask. "She said shit in Cantonese" replies Centauri before grabbing Kia's paws and dragging her across the ground into the house and I follow her. Centauri slams Kia against the wall knocking Kia's hood off her head before using her handcuffs to handcuff Kia to the stone fire place. "Nǐ wèi shé yào bǎngjià háizi ma?" asks Centauri and me and Rain look at each other in confusion. "Yàoqǐng wǒ de zhǔrén Salitar" replies Kia. "What are you two saying?" I ask. "I am explaining to your toy here that I kidnap children for my Master Salitar" she replies before I move Centauri out of the way. "Why did you kill my sister?" I ask. "I didn't Didra did, And we did it for payback" says Kia before I look at rain. "Get me a bowl" I say and Rain walks out of the room and soon returns with a bowl. I push the bowl up against Kia's wound, Her blood begins to pool inside the bowl and when I am happy with the amount I pour it all over the handcuff's and her paws. "Oh....Your smart" says Kia smiling before I grab her robe and then I smash my fist into her face. I don't stop with one, I keep hammering my fist into her face with the rage I feel towards her organization and then I feel Centauri pull me back away from Kia who smiles at me with alot of her teeth knocked out. "Come on, is that it Mortal?" she asks before her teeth grow back almost instantly and her bruises heal immediately. "Centauri, Watch the hell child and get more info out of her, Also please call my grandfather and tell him to bring some friends" I say before walking with Rain up stairs to go to bed.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Questioning.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Marco's point of view).
"stay with her" I say to Andreas who currently has Cinder sobbing in his arms and he nods before I get the door. I see a Robot that looks almost exactly like Centauri except instead of glowing blue lenses and other parts that glow blue these glow red and this one is wearing a Obsidian black jacket with the words CAROLINE sewn in Red on the sleeves and it bows. "I am Caroline, I am sorry to hear about your daughter but I would appreciate it if you gave me the clearance to come into your home for a conversation" she says in a voice like Centauri's but more robotic and hard to understand. "Uh...Sure..." I say stepping out of her way and she comes in. "Who's..." begins Andreas but Caroline interrupts him. "I am Caroline, I find this body allows me to interact and study organisms and other sciences better than my old one, I could not find any robotic bodies better than Centauri so I made a copy of her, of course I changed some things so people would not get confused" says Caroline. "What do you want?" I ask her. "We are offering you 30 million for Centauri's ownership contract" says Caroline and I shake my head. "No, You gave her to us and she is a big help" I reply and she makes a beep noise. "Alright...., If that is what you want, ill keep this here in case you change your mind" says Caroline before putting down a piece of paper and walking outside.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Government.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: "Good morning Alex" says Kia still handcuffed and I give her the finger before sitting down at the coffee table. "I think if I was a mortal my wounds would be getting horribly infected from all this dirt and ash here" she says and I ignore her. "Can I have a piece of bread? Or maybe some cereal for breakfast?" she asks and I turn around. "Shut up, You don't deserve even a crumb" I say and she smiles at me. "Oh? are we talking about what we have done in our lives? Yes maybe I have tortured thousands upon thousands of people, Kidnapped children, Scarred them and even killed thousands of them, Stolen there innocent little lives from them, Yes I may be evil but my soul is Half demon and the other half is forsaken but I have been at this longer than your family traces back to, You however have killed what? a hundred people? You know that Swiss girl you kicked off the train that was slowly killed? She had a family, Not a husband or children but she had a little sister, She even had parents who now cry almost every day for what you did!" says Kia with a wicked smile on her face and I shoot up from my chair thinking of what I should do to her. "your soul isn't so pure either....Look in the mirror, Those are demon eyes" she says before giggling and then the front door opens revealing my grandfather. "Alex!" says my grandfather and I smile before walking over to him and I give him a tight hug. I look over his shoulder to see 2 snake people standing there wearing trench coats with one of the coats black and the other a dark navy blue. "Who are these two?" I ask. "This is Venomous and his son Sector" says My grandfather and I hear Kia laugh behind me. "What a name!" she shouts and I hear a hiss from either Sector or Venomous. "Let me guesss, That issss the hell child" says Sector and I nod before giving him a questioning look. "Do you have a speech impediment or something?" I ask and he nods. "I pronounce Sssss multiple timessss no matter what the sssituation isssss" he says and I almost laugh cause its like a snake from a cartoon but I manage to keep a straight face. "Well Nice to meet you" I say walking down the stairs and I shake his hand. Sector has shiny obsidian scales with green snake eyes and no hair. His mouth has a long red forked tongue like a snakes and his teeth are white with transparent fangs up inside his gums. Behind him I notice he has a tail as well with some kind of black device on the end of it. His hand also has claws instead of finger nails. After releasing his hand I shake his fathers who looks almost the exact same except he doesn't have the weapon on his tail. "Lets go inside" I say and we all go inside.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: New friends.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
"So....How are we...." begins Sector before the door is blown off its hinges and it smashes into Centauri knocking her down to the ground. We all in 2 seconds stand up with our weapons drawn and infront of us stands Mausso looking at us lazily and then rolling his eyes. "I had a feeling it was you" he says before looking at Kia. "There you are, Lord Suffer was curious what happened to you, We assumed Zaros managed to kill you" says Mausso before I pull the trigger and I send a bullet ripping through his skull but all it does is jerk his head to the side a bit and then he turns to us as the wound is healing. "Hmm, alright then" he says before getting into a fighting stance and then a glowing green sword appears in his hand. "Devium" he says before an invisible force rips through the house in all directions and we all are thrown backwards through the air. I crash into what I think is the closet causing half of the door to fall down on my legs while the other half is underneath me and I get up before drawing my Katana and I charge towards him. The invisible force grabs me again and I soar through the air across the room and into the kitchen before I crash up against the steel refrigerator and I hit the hard ground in a second. It takes me a few seconds to get up but when I do I see Centauri fighting him.

(Centauri's point of view).
I kick the man in the side of the face before I aim my wrist gun at his face and I fire a laser into his face blowing the back of his head out but some how he grabs my arm and snaps it down. My systems begin blinking red and telling me that my right arm is now useless so I smash my head against his and then I kick him with both feet but he disappears and appears behind me before his sword slashes across my back causing me to collapse to the ground.

(Rain's point of view).
I grab a knife off the fireplace that Alex used last Night to eat an apple with and I throw it across the room to have it stab into his chest directly at his heart but he rips it out and throws it at me barely missing my neck by an inch. Before I can react he appears behind me and he grabs the fur on my head before yanking me back and then he kicks my legs out before he grabs my jacket and he throws me across the room into someone and we both crash through the drywall and I feel 2 of the supports snap in half against my and the person I hit's back.

(Sector's point of view).
"Ssshit!!" I shout before the Wolfkin crashes into me and we both crash into the wall. I grit my teeth from the pain in my left shoulder before I force myself to stand up. I turn my tail blade on before I charge towards him letting out a loud hiss before I jump through the air leaning forward so my hands touch the ground which I use to propel myself into him. the two of us crash the ground and I raise my arm up with my claws ready to claw his eyes out but an invisible force rockets me through the air causing me to crash into the roof and then I collapse onto the hard floor.

(Mausso's point of view).
I sigh before sending Alex crashing back into the fridge to keep him down and then I look at Kia who is smiling at me. "Great job" she says before I make a cord of Razor wire shoot out of the ground and rip the handcuffs off. "Why haven't you healed yourself?" I ask Kia as she stand up. "Little prick put my blood on my hands, meaning I couldn't use my powers on the handcuffs" she says before I heal her. "Open the Portal Mausso" she says before I draw a circle which glows green and then enlarges before turning into a perfect image of the Suffer realm and then we both walk through.

(Alex's point of view).
Everyone!, In we go!!" I yell stumbling forward to follow Mausso and Kia and I see Rain coming as well. "Rain!, Stay here!" I say and she lowers her ears. "Lets go!" I say jumping inside the portal and I collapse down onto the grey ground before Sector jumps through followed by my grandfather, Venomous and then Rain jumps through. "RAIN!!" I yell before she wags her tail happy that she is now coming. Centauri tries to follow at the last second but is blown back by an invisible force again and after that I don't see anything else because the portal closes and we are all left in the Suffer realm with Kia and Mausso gone.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Mausso.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Clove's point of view).
"Please!, Don't kill me!" begs a man that I have just shot in the shoulder after shooting him in the foot. "Vhy vould I Not?" I ask spinning my pistol around like a cowboy. "Please!" he begs before I smile and then I take aim and I pull the trigger sending a bullet through his eyeball. "Was für ein schöner Tag (What a beautiful day)" I say looking up at the grey sky before I turn around and I walk back to Sarok and Shade sitting down on logs. "Nice shot Clove" says Nicky Magiak walking into our camp. "Danke" I say before sitting down on one of the logs and I take a drink of water from my water bottle before Sarok stands up. "Have we gotten any more word from Mausso, Didra or Kia?" asks Sarok and I shake my head. "Nein, Ich werde Ihnen sagen, wenn wir tun (No, I will tell you if we do)" I say before I see another wandering around the forest. "One second" I say before picking up the sniper rifle in camp and I take aim before pulling the trigger, blowing a womans head off.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Life after Death.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Alex's point of view).
"Rain!, Why did you come!" I ask and she hugs me while wagging her tail. "Love can't separate us" she says happily and I sigh before hugging her back tightly. "Ok Love birds, lets go" says Venomous and I look around. "what Direction?" I ask. "I smell the forest ahead of us" says Rain and we all try smelling the air but we don't smell anything. "Follow me" she says leading the way and we all start off on a slow jog.

(Kia's point of view).
"There are a few unwanted guests, Kia, Take care of them" says Lord Suffer after I heal my claws. "Salitar one of my prisoners escaped, Could I please find them fi...." I begin but I am interrupted. "JUST DO IT!!" shouts Salitar his eyes turning into Orbs of Fire and I lower my ears before teleporting to my playground and I look at all the failures at my games hanging from Nooses of Razor wire while others are hanged up on meat hooks. "This is gonna be fun" I say before floating up into the air to wait.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Suffer Realm.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Rain's point of view).
"Nice nose Wolfkin" says Venomous Sarcastically when we come across a playground that looks like a massacre had happened. The playground equipment isn't the same either. The slide is covered in Razor blades and the swing is held by Razor wire with the seat covered in large fish hooks. "Hello Again" says Kia and we all look up to see her floating in the air, wearing a obsidian colored robe. Her claws have grown back and her face is hidden by shadows leaving only her eyes visible. "We got you once, and this time we will kill you" says Alex and Kia giggles. "Last time you had a robot, You also fought me in the mortal world, This is my world and my powers are much stronger Here, Now, Let us begin" she says before coils of Razor wire shoot out of the ground and begin moving through the air around Kia before shooting towards us.

I draw my bow and I take aim with an arrow in my hand before releasing the arrow. The arrow cuts through the air and soars through the Razor wire coils and buries itself into Kia's chest. "Ha!" I say before she rips it out and appears infront of me. "Zàijiàn!!!" she shouts before the invisible force blasts me back through the air and I crash into Alex.

(Sector's point of view).
While Kia is distracted I turn on the laser blade for my tail and I dive through the air to stab her and I do manage to bury my blade into her neck while stabbing my tailblade into her gut. I am simply blown off of her and before I know it I crash into someone and we both hit the ground with a loud thud.

(Alex's point of view).
"Off!" I shout to Sector pushing him off of me before I draw my pistol with my Katana in my left hand and I cross my pistol over my elbow of my right arm before I begin pulling the trigger sending bullets into Kia's face and chest. In a blink she disappears and I feel a set of blades slash me in the back. I quickly turn around in time to block another slash.

(Kia's point of view).
I jump up into the air to slash Alex in the face, hopefully blinding him but he blocks my claws before kicking me down to the ground. I roll across the ground before I teleport behind him but he is ready and he blocks another strike. I enlarge my claws to attempt to stab him in the face but he dodges it before grabbing them and smashing his fist into my face.
