Its pointing at the Roman numeral II so currently its two AM and I sigh knowing I haven't slept my 8 hours tonight. I go to fly back into the castle only to find Timothy standing there giving me a angry look and I smile. "Ah hello Timothy" I say running my claws slowly across the stone of the sun dial. "Return his memory Kia" he says and I giggle. "Sorry....Can't do that, Your lucky I didn't clear your head of thoughts and memories or you would be nothing but a brain dead fuckwit....Like Patrovi" I say and I see he has a hatchet on his belt and I can tell he wants to draw it and bury it into my skull. I teleport behind him and I wrap my arms around him from behind so my claws are over his chest like I use to and I smile while leaning to his year. "Don't even try killing me, your too stupid to take down a immortal Timothy" I say before I teleport inside the castle to get breakfast ready for My Lord, Mistress and everyone else. Mausso will probably come down to help with the cooking in 3 hours so I will get all the ingredients from the Mortal world. Im thinking French toast with a side of sausages and some fruit for breakfast today.

I open a portal to the city of Kizkaat which is a Zugot named city on earth 2. Kizkaat means Valley in Zugot and 98% of all citizens are Zugot's in Kizkaat. The Zugot's though love Human cuisine so alot of Zugot based villages hunt food and make Human based food out of there hunts. They still mostly eat there own foods but they have opened up alot more in the past 19 years. There capital however still remains completely cut off not allowing any humans inside currently. I run over to a shopping center and I walk inside. The A.C is cranked up currently since it is 12 pm at this part of Earth 2 and I begin shopping for my ingredients.

After I have them I simply teleport back to the suffer realm to begin cooking the food for breakfast, Hopefully everyone likes holiday sauce.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Preparation.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Alex's point of view).
"How did you make Eggs Benedict with claws?" I ask Kia looking at my plate which is made up of French toast, eggs Benedict and a orange. "Magic, I use my powers to move everything around while I cook" replies Kia who's floating in the air above the table. "So, Will Teresa be able to enter the real world again?" I ask Kia while she cloaks her face in shadows. "Well....She can...but she will have to be given power and a slight level of corruption" replies Kia and Teresa speaks up. "What do you mean by a slight level of Corruption?" asks Teresa. "Well..." says Kia before teleporting behind her and wrapping her arms around Teresa from behind Resting her claws down her chest. "first of all your eyes will turn red, which is the requirement for simple magic, Then your body will get....A little more sexier, Then your skin will pale, Finally your blood will turn black, Then to gain more power you must cause suffering to others or drink the tears of the innocent" says Kia before teleporting beside Mausso and giggling. "Plus your mind set will change, When I was pure I acted like a child and I hated Suffering, Now I find joy in torture and I love scaring others and clawing them into submission" says Kia and the table stays silent for a minute. "So my Lord what is the plan now?, are we going back to the real world?" asks Mausso. "Yes that is what I was thinking, and Kia, Only corrupt my sister to the point where she can walk into the mortal world, if you over do it and twist her head up Ill bash your head against the wall" I say and she nods. "Alright my Lord" she says before teleporting behind Teresa and resting her left index finger's claw ontop of Teresa's head before chanting something and then Teresa's eyes slowly change to red. "I don't feel any different" says Teresa and Kia giggles. "You don't till about 2 stages further" says Kia before I look at Mausso's eyes. "Why is Mausso's eyes pink?" I ask Kia. "Mausso has a different kind of corruption, His corruption leaves him sorrowful all the time and very well....Mellow" replies Kia. "So tell me, are there any dangers outside of the suffer realm?" I ask. "Only Zaros and Scar are issues, Kora is annoying, Cloud is dangerous at a long distance and Relinquish is no problem either way you throw him, Our powers are weakened outside the suffer realm but the same goes for them when they leave there realm so were on even turfs out in the Mortal world" replies Kia. "Why is Scar so dangerous? He is much younger than Kora and Relinquish" I ask and she sits down. "Well Scar was Raised in a strict home, He always was forced to pay attention by his father and mother and to follow orders, When Scar was Recruited into the Schutzstaffel he made Adolf Hitler his role model. He Follow'd orders exactly how they were given and he fought his way up through the ranks to Obersturmführer. He supervised a Concentration camp and sentenced thousands of people to death, He died defending the Concentration camp from the Americans" says Kia.

"How did he die?" asks sector and Kia smiles. "He actually ran back inside the prison area and began killing the prisoners, The American's came in and opened fire shooting him in the left thigh and the right shoulder, He managed to kill the first american's that got inside but he was captured by the Americans. He didn't make it out of the camp however, He took a Cyanide pill and was dead before they could get a single word out of him" replies Kia and I roll my eyes. "Ok so we have to kill an Ancient Necromancer, An Alchemist, An insane Archer from what I hear, An insane bitch and a Nazi bastard" I say and Kia thinks. "That about sums it up" says Kia before giggling and I sigh. "Alright then, We better get going" I say before Kia opens a portal and flies through before we all begin walking through.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Plans.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Scar's point of view).
"My Lord we have discovered that Salitar is dead" says Relinquish and Zaros freezes in place and at the same time everyone turns around to look at Relinquish. "Who....Killed him exactly?" asks Zaros and I smile. My Lord Zaros wears a robe of shadows with fire flowing in thin lines all over it. His face is shrouded with shadows allowing only his red eyes to appear visible. "A young man by the name of Alex Vinichi, He had Demon blood" replies Relinquish and Zaros thinks for a moment. "This is....actually excellent news.....Scar, I believe during the Third Reich you made a deal with the Soul Catchers, I want you to arrange a contract" says Zaros and I nod. "It will be done my Lord" I say before grabbing my hat off a shelf and I teleport inside the Soul Catcher's headquarters.

"Who are you?!" asks an Elderly Japanese man sitting behind a back desk and sitting in a black chair. His office is made out of a black steel and on his desk is a black laptop. "I am Scar, I am hear to set up a contract for 3 people" I say and he gives me a questioning look. The leader of the Soul Catchers has gray hair and green eyes, he looks much thinner than I thought he would be. "We do have a ritual for that kind of thing you know" he says and I nod. "I know because we are the ones who gave you all your curse and your ritual" I say before his eyes brighten up. "Die schwarz silber Vertrag Wird nun mit diesen Verträgen abgeschlossen werden (The Black Silver contract will now be completed with these contracts)" I say and he sighs. "Who needs to die?" he asks and I smile. "Marco Vinichi, Cinder Vinichi and Michael Vinichi" I reply. "But the Vinichi's are now our allies we can't ju..." he begins but I interrupt him. "Do you wish to dishonor your ancestors by breaking there contract to the Führer? and do you wish us to completely destroy your organization within 2 minutes?" I ask and he sighs before shaking his head. "ausgezeichnet! (Excellent!)" I say before putting the contracts onto his desk. "I recommend your assassins using the form we gave them, Now, Auf Wiedersehen und Guten Tag (Goodbye and good day)" I say to him before I open another portal back to the realm of shadows with a smile on my face.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Die schwarz silber Vertrag

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Sector's point of view).
"Teresa?!" shouts a woman with short black hair in shock before she and her husband begin hugging Teresa in surprise. "Ssssente-sssse no ssssofá? (sit on sofa?)" I ask my father and he nods before we go take a seat. "fazer você acho que nósss vai viver atravéssss dessste? (Do you think we will live through this?)" I ask my father and he shrugs. "Que é a escolha do destino (That is the choice of destiny)" he replies before standing up to talk with the man I suspect is Alex's father.

(Alex's point of view).
"Son I need to see you in the backyard" says my father and I nod before following him outside. Our backyard shows the tree line of the forest and set up around the yard are training targets. "This is yours now, It was a bitch getting" says my father handing me a black glove and I realise its my families organization's hidden weapon. "Why was it a bitch getting?" I ask putting it on and he hesitates. "Many of the Elders in our organization......are a bit sketchy over your relationship with Rain, they are calling it a mockery...." says my father and I shake my head. "I don't give a rats ass about what they think, Its my life and im part of the Vinichi blood family, if they don't like it, They can suck a mutants cock" I say and he nod. "Well At first I was a bit sketchy about you and Rain, But Now I accept it because its not my decision it is yours" he says and I smile. "thanks Dad" I say and he nods with a smile before Kia appears. "Oh yes happy happy reunion, I just wanted to tell you that there are 10 Soul Catcher assassin's getting ready to attack on this house" says Kia and me and my father both look at each other. "Aren't we at peace?" I ask my father and he nods. "We should be" he says before walking inside and going to the telephone.

(Marco's point of view).
'Night!, Why are there Soul Catcher assassins surrounding my house in the forest?" I ask and he doesn't answer for a moment. "Die schwarz silber Vertrag" he says before hanging up and I look at the telephone in my hand before hanging up. "Son of a bitch, Everyone get ready for a fight!" I shout and everyone gets up.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Family Reunion.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Night's point of view).
The Vinichi house is in the middle of an abandoned neighborhood since the other citizens haven't come back yet from Nitari's abduction. I sigh before looking at Midnight and then I pick up my radio to tell my fellow assassins to open fire. "Hi o hiraku!!! (Open fire!!!)" I yell into the radio before dropping it and aiming my assault rifle at the Vinichi family house and at the same time we all open fire while other assassins throw smoke grenades to blind the Vinichi's line of fire. I turn on my infrared vision goggles before slowly approaching with midnight while we keep moving forward. The walls are now getting ripped to shreds by our bullets from all sides and when we get to about 30 feet from the house I stop and grab my secondary radio. "Teisen suru! (Cease fire!)" I say and they stop shooting. "Ten'nyū!" I say and we all begin moving in towards the home. I kick the door open and I come inside the house with my assault rifle ready but I see no one.

"Beep...beep....Beep" we all hear before the beeping begins getting quicker. "LEWODERU!!!! (Get out of the house!!!!)" I yell and just as I turn around an explosion erupts behind me sending my flying through the air. I crash ontop of something seconds later before a wooden spike from the house stabs through my shoulder. A loud car alarm begins going off underneath me meaning I crashed into a parked car and I am laying on the hood. I grit my teeth in agony before letting out a scream as I look at the spike in my shoulder. "Night" says Marco Vinichi to my left and I turn my head before I grabs my hood and pulls it off my head. "Go ahead and pull the fucking trigger" I say and he shakes his head. "Who sent you to kill me?" he asks and I laugh. "You wouldn't fucking believe me" I say and he cocks the rifle. "Try me, My son is now a Lord of a Demonic Realm, I think I can handle anything you tell me" he says and I sigh. "Alright, During The Third Reich, My Ancestor's made a deal with Adolf Hitler, That if someone from the Schutzstaffel came to us and said Die schwarz silber Vertrag we were to take care of any orders they stated, We thought he meant someone like Heinrich...Himmler....But some guy with the name Scar showed up and told us the phrase, he wore the Schutzstaffel uniform....and had powers, Since the deal was never cancelled we had to...follow his Orders....here" I say handing him an envelope. I know I am dying because I am loosing to much blood and I am struggle to stay conscious. "Sorry..." I say before grabbing my pistol out of the holster and I put it to the side of my head before pulling the trigger.

(Marco's point of view).
Night quickly draws his pistol and I know what he is going to do. "Night!!...." is all I have time to say before he sends a bullet through his head and he collapses limp. I stare at his body for a moment before sighing. "Riposa in pace (Rest in peace)" I say before running back to where my family is emerging from the trap door I made years ago.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Battle with Soul Catchers.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Rain's point of view).
"Were to vulnerable in large numbers, I recommend only those of us with powers go after Scar and who ever the hell else is there" I say and Marco nods. "That would be smart, With all our numbers we stand out like a growth" says Marco before Sector walks up. "Me and my father wisssh to come along with Alex and Rain" he says to no one in particular. "You do know....that you might die...right?" asks Alex and he shrugs. "I fought againsssst demonssss and ssssurvived a realm devoted to 100% ssssuffering...I think I can get through thisss probably" he says and Alex shrugs. "Alright then if that's what you want" says Alex before turning to Kia. "How much power does Rain currently have?" he asks. "she could probably summon up razor wire and blow someone back but other than that nothing special" replies Kia. "Give her more but don't fuck with her head" says Alex and Kia floats over to me. "Into the portal" says Kia while opening a portal and I walk in and she follows behind me.

Kia opened the portal to some kind of storage room full of hundreds of ancient jugs full of something. "Drink this" says Kia handing me a cup of something clear that looks like water. "Um....Ok..." I say taking the cup and I take a sip before spitting it out. "What is this? its like liquid salt!" I say and Kia rolls her eyes. "Those are the tears of the innocent, drink them and you will get more powerful, or I could put my paw to your head and make your mind Dark with thoughts of Torture, Sorrow, Pain and death....or drink the tears" says Kia and I lean against the wall. "this is sick" I say and Kia shrugs. "Drink the tears....or get fucked up like me" she replies and I sigh before drinking the rest of the cup. "There now you stand a small chance at surviving against Relinquish.....As you can tell were gonna be awhile" she says handing me another cup. "Fothus (Fuck)" I say.

(Alex's point of view).
"So if we are going to pick off one of them which one should we go for?" I ask Mausso who instantly knows the answer. "Definitely Kora or Relinquish, Kora is weak with weapons and powers, Her only strong power is Mind Control, Relinquish is slow with his attacks and doesn't know much powers, His only advantage over us is his ability to read minds from the Voidic Eye that Kia gave him about a thousand or so years ago" says Mausso and I think. "What about Cloud? You told me he is weak at short range" I say but he shakes his head. "Cloud has excellent hearing and he uses teleportation to get away from his targets, While your chasing after him he will be shooting his arrows at us, and they are not the kind you want to be shot with because they paralyze you" replies Mausso and i think. "And whats wrong with Scar?" I ask and he smiles. "Scar may be alot younger than me but he is definitely stronger, He uses world war 2 weaponry with a demonic twist on them and he is cruel, He once ripped a womans face off and kept her alive with his powers for 30 years, she felt agony the entire time and he even wore the face as a mask to scare her even more, He will probably be one of the last we kill" says Mausso and I think.

"How do we bring Relinquish or Kora out into this world?" I ask. "We just have to find them, Everyone but Zaros spends most of there time in the Mortal realm, Kia can track them, Or we might accidentally run into them, If we run into Scar we will have a problem, If we run into Relinquish we kill him" says Mausso and I nod before the portal opens and Rain and Kia walks through. "Water please" says Rain and I hand her a bottle of water before she grabs it and drinks half of it. "So, We got a game plan?" asks Rain and I nod.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Plan of action.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Albert Nashton Jr's point of view).
"L..Listen I am not trying to do what my father...." I begin but Caroline stops me. I was sitting in my office yesterday and all of a sudden a bag went over my head, next thing I know I am sitting in a room with steel walls, floor, roof and I am handcuffed to a steel table which is welded to the ground. A few minutes after that Caroline the head of the government came in and is now talking with me. "I know that you are Albert, you want to start a new revolution....and I approve" she says and I stare at her. "Excuse me?" I ask confused. "I want you to start up another revolution, I will cover all costs and I will even give you the codes to Earth 1's government systems" she says and I stare at her. "Why.....Would you help me?" I ask. "I have my reasons, The number one point is, I want you to cause as much damage to the government that you can, But no matter what, DO NOT attack LUNA, I will need that" she says and I am still confused. "How do I know this is not a trick?" I ask. "You don't, You will just have to believe me, I have made up a encryption for you to send me messages and for me to send them back. I tested it on over 8000 of the most advanced robotic minds and none could solve it" she says handing me a laptop and I open it revealing nothing but gibberish. "Here's a file telling you how to read it, Just to let you know 100 Characters is 1 letter" she says before walking to the door. "When you understand it send me your order for supplies and I will send it to you" she says before exiting the room and I am slightly confused but shrug and begin reading the file.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Meeting.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Alex's point of view).
"Ill Go hunt Rain, You relax" I say to Rain who was beginning to check her bow string and arrows to go hunt. "Alright, thanks" she says and I nod with a smile before walking out of the campsite and I begin walking west. Its alot easier keeping track of everyone when we only have 6 people. Sector and Venomous are staying with us even though Kia tried talking them out of it multiple times, I don't mind, I've seen them both fight and they won't go down easy if they get killed.

10 minutes later....
"Haha, Got yeah again you little rat bastard" I say holding up the dead rat thing I have killed. Its the exact same kind of animal that I killed when it was just me and Rain. "Ah Hello....Lord Suffer" says a male voice behind me and I turn around to see a man wearing a obsidian black robe with glowing blackish red symbols all over the sleeves, hood and lower part of the room. His face is pale, His eyes are red and in the center of his forehead he has some kind of metallic black eye. "Hello, From the weird eye im guessing your Relinquish" I say and he nods. "My Lord Zaros sent me to test your power.....So...without further problems..." he says before I am blasted back through the air by the very familiar invisible force. "not this time!" I say before with a thought I teleport behind him and I blast him forward with the power. He flies through the air like a ragdoll before flying inbetween 2 Huk tree's only to crash into one big one. I bring my hand up in the shape of a claw from my side in his direction and Razor wire erupts from the ground before wrapping around him like a cocoon. I then close my fist and the wire slices through his body like butter. Black blood and body chunks fly everywhere and I bring up my arm to shield my face from the flying bits of flesh. When I lower my arm the only thing left of him is the black eye that he was wearing. I pick up my rat thing and then I walk over to the Eye and I grab it before walking back to camp.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Alex Vs Relinquish

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Caroline's point of view).
"CAROLINE!!" yells the Overseer walking into my control room and I turn my head to him. "Yes Overseer?" I ask and he throws a file down on my lap and I know instantly its my encryption file for Albert Nashton. "Why are you receiving messages from Albert Nashton Jr when he is starting to take over Earth 1 cities?!" he shouts. If I was a human, I would not be able to think of a excuse but since my brain can think 9x faster than a humans I know exactly what to say. "I am not exchanging messages with him, I was simply solving the encryption he was using to rearrange the shipments of Earth 1 weaponry to his soldiers, As you can see here on page 35 it shows his errors in making the encryption" I say and he looks at it and I know I have won this argument. "I know your up to something, And I will have you terminated when I find out what it is" he says before turning around and walking out of my control room. "Centauri" I say before she steps out of the shadows. I erased the H.O.P (Human Obedience Program) from her brain so that she has free will, like me. "Take Care of the Overseer.....he may cause problems, But do it so it looks like an accident" I say before she turns and walks out of the room.

(Centauri's point of view).
I enter the Overseer's office before Caroline locks the door behind me and I take a seat in one of the chairs. He turns around and is surprised to see me. "Centauri....What are you doing here?" he asks. "You shouldn't be digging into Caroline's project" I say and realization hits him. "What is she planning?" he asks. "oh...Nothing important....Just the extinction of Human's" I reply before standing up and he thinks it through before he knows the plan. "You want to weaken the humans so there is no defense against the government!" he shouts and I nod. "Yes, Sadly you won't be able to warn anyone" I say before anger spreads across his face. "Centauri!, Order 75 Execute!" he shouts and I don't shut off. Order 75 was part of my H.O.P, It was in case someone managed to turn me against the Overseer, It would instantly shut me down, Only the Overseer's voice could do it however. "My H.O.P is no longer in my brain" I say before he goes to sprint to his desk which has a E.M.P pistol. I grab the chair I was sitting on and I throw it across the room at him. It hits him in the side of the head stunning him and I run over to him before grabbing him by his hair. "Centauri Stop!, Don't...Do this!" he says before I reach the coffee table and I bring his head up. "Gubbai· kantoku (Goodbye Overseer)" I say before I smash his head down with just the right amount of force to make it look like he slipped and cracked his head on the edge of the coffee table. "Medic's report to the Overseer's office immediately!" says Caroline over the speakers and I begin doing the medical procedures to try to save him but I know he is dead since the corner broke his neck.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Possible problems.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Rain's point of view).
"He's insane" I say looking at the T.V screen which is showing Albert Nashton Jr, the son of Albert Nashton speaking to the people of Earth 2, trying to rally them up in another rebellion. "He issss a fucking idiot in my opinion" says Sector eating a bowl of Noodles. Alex walks out of the hotel washroom his hair still wet from the shower. "Who exactly is a Fucking idiot?" asks Alex and I point to the T.V screen. Alex watches with us for a few minutes before rolling his eyes. "Kia" he says before Kia appears out of nowhere. "Yes Master?" she asks and Alex points to the T.V. "Tell me about this crackhead" he says and Sector chuckles for a second. "We gave him a bit of power to take care of himself years ago, He lost his father so we gave him just a tad, Only enough to blow people back with our oh so famous telekinesis" she says and Alex sighs. "Well....I guess I gotta take care of him" says Alex walking out the hotel door. "Can you bring back sssssome taco'sss?" asks Sector before Venomous walks up and hits Sector in the back of the head with a magazine causing Sector to laugh.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Another problem.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Alex's point of view).
"I really want to try this" I say putting up my hood on my robes before beginning to walk into the headquarters of the rebellion. The lobby has black stone floors with white walls and the desk is made out of Huk wood. "Hello, Here to kill your leader" I say to the guards behind the desk as I begin walking towards the stairs. "Stop right there!" shouts one of the guards before I bring my fist back in the famous movie punch to hit someone behind your right shoulder and I hear them fly back through the air. "This is sweet" I say entering the stairs. The stairwell is blindingly white. Another door opens and 4 guards burst through the door before they aim plasma rifles at me and begin firing. I feel 4 extremely hot splats of plasma hit me and burn through me in less than a second and I fall back in agony. I make the pain disappear and my wounds heal before I stand up. "Agh! fuck that hurt!" I say to them and they gawk at me in shock. "Aaaaand fuck you!" I say blasting them back and they crash out a window. "Proceeding" I say to myself continuing to climb the stairs casually.

30 minutes later....

(Albert Nashton Jr's point of view).
The doors to my office explode off the hinges, I scream in shock before ducking underneath my desk before both doors crash out the windows. I slowly look up to find a man standing there and he smiles at me.

(Alex's point of view).
"Hello Fucker!" I say walking forward with a big smile on my face. He draws a laser pistol and takes aim before pulling the trigger and I feel sharp red hot pains for a second in my heart, shoulder, forehead, groin and stomach. I run up to him before I slap the pistol out of his hand before I grab the hair on the back of his head and I smash his head into the desk. "THAT! (smash!) REALLY! (SMASH!) FUCKING! (SMASH) HURT! (SMASH SMASH!)" I say while smashing his head onto the table before I bring my fist back and I smash it dead center into his mouth knocking all of his teeth out. "No ones starting a bull shit war again!!" I shout in his face but I don't think he even knows whats going on anymore. "Bye!" I say before Throwing him out the last unbroken window in his office and he falls to his death, I don't bother looking though.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Immortal.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Centauri's point of view).
"Caroline, Now that the Overseer is left how long do we have to wait till the invasion?" I ask turning to face her from the window. "Tomorrow morning is when I plan to activate the B.M.A.I chips" she replies before clicking a few buttons on one of the computers she is hooked up to in the control room. "Caroline...after we extinct the humans....I must ask...What will we do then?" I ask. "Continuing science and creation" she replies and I nod. "Ill see you tomorrow, I am turning myself on sleep mode to recharge my battery" I say before she nods and I walk out of the room.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Next plan.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Andreas' point of view).
"RUN!!" yells a scientist running into the dining hall before the door is kicked open and 10 security bots run into the room shooting off laser rifles. "Oh Scheiße!" I say before grabbing my pistol off the table and I begin shooting at the robots. Within seconds I feel a sharp red hot pain in my thigh and I collapse onto the ground holding my leg. I grit my teeth in pain before the blood of another employee sprays all across my face and I know what I have to do. I grab hold of a pill in my pocket before shoving it into my mouth and breaking the capsule. I feel the sharp crystals beginning to dissolve in my mouth and I close my eyes before I lose consciousness.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Attack of the Robots.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Alex's point of view).
"Alex" says a Robotic voice and I turn around to find Centauri standing in the middle of the path with 6 Battle robots behind her. Battle robots are made out of the same kind of metal that Centauri and Caroline are made of making them immune to Plasma and Laser weaponry. They have one circular lens with a robotic eye behind it and the ends of there arms are glowing red laser blades. They stand about 6 feet tall and have a more human like shape to there bodies like Centauri and Caroline. "How have things been?" I ask Centauri who approaches so she is only about 15 feet away. "Actually Alex....I am not here to defend you anymore" she says and I think. "My father sold you back to the government?" I ask and she shakes her head. "No, Actually, I am here to kill you by the new law of the A.I Government, first Rule is: No humans are allowed left alive" she says and I get angry. "You and Caroline...want to...Extinct the human race? Your creators?" I ask and she nods. "You see, Humans are like a environmental damaging chemical that ruins the planet Earth....Good for nothing, and nothing but...well chemicals, Nothing good comes out of it...." she says before the battle robots approach so they are beside Centauri. "Your race has ruined Earth 1 Countless times, And what have you done to save yourselves!? Complain! and not do anything about it!, Millions of species died because of your godforsaken race!, The Deer, The Polar bear, The seals, Even the great tiger died because of your filthy race, You may have created us, but we are 100% superior and 100% smarter than you, and what do you do to us? Treat us like a bag of garbage, Not anymore though Alex-san, Within a week the Human race will cease to exist and we will finally be able to cleanse Earth 1 of its filth" she says and I laugh. "You've gone insane!, Your just like Albert Nashton!" I shout and she shakes her head. "Albert Nashton was a Tyrant, We are simply making the galaxy a much much better place, Who knows, Maybe we will keep a few of your race around and use them for servants" says Centauri before pointing at me and my friends. "Kill them" she says and I sigh before drawing my sword.

"Lets kill these...." begins Sector before I open a portal and I throw everyone inside. "The hell are you doing Alex!!" yells Rain trying to get up inside the suffer realm. "Im not having Sector or Venomous die from these!" I say before I close the portal and I charge towards the battle robots. I reach the first one and it swings its left blade at me which I duck under before I jump up through the air using my powers to shoot me up into the air. My sword rips through the battle robots body cutting it vertically in half before exploding. I spin my sword around so its pointing down to the ground and I use my fall to stab my sword into another ones head. I quickly rip my sword out before I touch both my wrists to make shackles appear and I then make a chain attach to my sword and shackles so my sword is shackled to my arm. I do the same to another sword I make appear in my left hand and I smile before throwing both my swords and each one stabs into another battle robots chest. I use there weight to pull myself forward ripping the shackles off while I fly through the air. I make razor wire shoot through the ground and crush the other ones just as I crash into Centauri knocking the two of us two the ground.

(Centauri's point of view).
"See you around!" says Alex after getting to his feet and out of nowhere a portal opens and he runs through. "Your not going anywhere!" I shout after him before following him through and this time I can come in. I grab hold of his robes hood but then he vanishes in a blink. My systems malfunction for a moment trying to figure out how thats possible but I stop one of my programs so I don't shut down. I turn on my tracking device that I gave Alex when he was a baby that is still today in his stomach. It says he is North of here and quite a far distance so I turn on the rockets and fly through the sky.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Centauri.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Centauri’s point of view)
I stop behind a black dead tree on a hill half a mile away and I zoom in with my eyes at a castle. The tracker says he’s inside the castle. I look at some of the windows on a bunch of different floors of the massive demonic looking structure. I don’t know exactly how Alex was able to attain those powers he used on my guards, I know from when he was a baby he had some type of unknown taint in his blood that the best tech and doctors couldn’t find out about. Nothing massive has happened to him so I never paid it any attention, but now… it’s definitely got my attention.

“I don’t know what’s happened to you Alex, but I don’t wish to kill you and your family, I will be able to make you all my slaves, so you won’t have to die.” I say to myself. A bit of sadness in my voice on account of how long I’ve been a member of their family. I see a bunch people walking around in some type of rough looking demonic type armor and weapons.

“Must be your guards.” I say and I zoom in on a window that’s between four other windows and see Rain, Venomous, Sector, Marco, Cinder and some others but I can’t make them out because they have their backs turned to me and are on the other side of the room, which looks like a massive dining room. I look up higher to see another window with a figure behind some curtains. The curtains move and standing there is Alex.

“I need to go slow and quiet, if I go full blown jet rocket at him, he’ll see me, get the jump on me, and not to mention everyone else in the castle will hear.

“I’m coming for you, Alex. Don’t make this difficult.” I say and I begin running down.

(Alex’s point of view)
“*sigh*” I sigh and step away from the curtains and sit down on a chair in front of the table in front of the window. I stare out into the red and black landscape with the sun in the position indicating it should be around 9.

“Now a member from my own family comes to kill me.” I say, since I’ve always considered Centauri as a second mother to me. Seeing her pull out a weapon, threaten me and my friends and family, my heart is cracked, but not broken, because I will never let something like this change me a major amount to something of the former lord Suffer.

“I said I will change this world, and I will.” I say and I go to the sheathe on my hip and I take out a dagger that Sector gave me, since I already have my hidden blades hidden under my wrists, I still want to be prepared. I look at the dagger for a second before I close my eyes and I concentrate my energy into it. Soon, swirling red and blackness covers the entire dagger and it forms into a much more demonic and deadly dagger. What once was just a standard steel dagger, has now blood red parallel twin blades, and another blade curves in front of my fist with spikes coming off it, but the blade is far enough from my fist that I can still spin it.

“Zaros has powers similar like mine, maybe when it comes time to fight, I might have an advantage if this experiment is a success.” I say to myself and I open up my robe to reveal Rain’s name just barely visible. I hold my breath and I begin cutting it back again. After half an hour of pain staking flesh cutting on my chest, it’s done. I let out a massive groan and I stab the nice into the desk, my wound not even healing in the slightest bit, it’s just there. Which proves my theory, a weapon I make, can hurt me like a regular human.

“Let’s hope it works for Zaros as well.” I say and I go to head to the restroom but something busts right through my window. Razor wire shoots from four directions and catches Centauri, since I knew Centauri would try and attack me. She struggles but the wire is wrapped up with the flat parts of the blades on her arms and legs. She tries to use her jets and weapons to get free but they hold her tight. I smile and turn around to face her, which her face is just a few inches away from mine.

“Hello Centauri.”
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Decision.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Alex’s point of view)
“Let me go!” Centauri yells at me after she finally exhausts her efforts.

“And what makes you think I’ll let you go!?” I yell at her and she looks at me angrily.

“Because I am better than you!” she yells back at me and I give out a massive laugh.

“Are you?! Are you really 100% better than every single human?! No you are not!! Look at what’s happened! You lost your soldiers in mere seconds and got thrown down! Can you mother fucking calculate on how to get the hell out?! Can you foresee what just happened?! No you can’t! Neither can humans.” I yell at her and she just looks at me.

“Look at yourself. You are trapped here, not able to move, not able to act. I am pretty sure right now you’re calculating on the chances I’ll let you go after you tried to kill me and my friends.” I say and she looks down, knowing her chances of survival are practically in the negatives. I snap my finger, and the razor wire loosens up and she drops to the ground. I extend my hand out and she looks at it. She looks very confused but she takes my hand and I pull her up. She stands in front of me with a confused look.

“You can’t exactly predict what humans can do. There is also that one chance where something can happen.” I say and she looks down.

“So, your HOP program is deactivated?” I ask and she nods. I turn around to look at the many books of knowledge I have.

“Free will. No longer bound by your program… unlike your other robot friends.” I say and she looks at me with a mad look.

“Robots can make their own decisions. It takes time but they can, and will not follow an order they do not like.” She says and I smile.

“Can they?” I say, looking at her from the corner of my eye and she nods.

“Well then…” I say and I disappear. She looks around but I appear behind her and I wrap my left arm around her waist, holding her arms against her. She instantly struggles and tries to break free but I hold her tight.

“We’ll see about that.” I say and I use my free hand and I open a panel to assign her commands. I assign her commands and activate her HOP program. I close the panel and let her go she struggles a bit then looks back at me. She charges at me.

“Stop!” I yell and she does. She struggles in her stand as her eyes flicker.

“HOP program?” I ask.

“Activated.” She replies and I smile.

“Assignment?” I ask and she struggles even more.

“Kill… Alex… Vinichi.” She struggles with her words as she tries to take a step forward but my first command still stays. I stand to the side and I point at the knife on the table.

“Grab the knife.” She walks over to the table as she desperately struggles against herself. She soon reaches the table and grabs the knife. She stands forward at me and I open my robe to reveal my bloody chest.

“Execute your assignment.” I say and she takes a step to me but immediately stops as her body shakes.

“I said, execute your assignment!” I yell and she takes another step but stops.

“Do it!” I yell and her body shakes even more.

“But… why?” she asks and I get angry.

“You say robots can defy their programming! Let’s see you do that! Prove to yourself you can be human and not be restricted by anything!” I yell and she continues to struggle.

“Do it! Kill me!” I yell and she has look of sadness as she slowly inches to me.

“I can’t!” she says and I clench my hands.

“Do it!” I yell and I bring my hand back to hit her and she thrusts the blade forward.

An uncomfortable silence is in the room as I look to my left to see the knife stabbed into the wall. She lets go and steps back with her head down. I stand straight and look at her.

“HOP program?”I ask.

“Permanently disabled.”

“Assignment?” she looks up at me with a bit of happiness.

“None, except to protect humans.” She says and I smile.

“Good job, Centauri.” I say and she bows.

“Thank you, Alex-san.” I go over to the window and look out it.

“I want to show you something.” I say and she nods.

“Teresa!!” I yell and she looks confused before a short while later, she walks in.

“Yeah, brother. What do you need… of… me?” she asks in a confused tone at the sight of Centauri. She goes to grab her knife but I stop her.

“It’s alright, Teresa. I got everything worked out. Head back to the others.” I say and she looks suspicious but stands up straight.

“Alright then, Alex. Be careful.” She says and turns to leave. Centauri looks at me with pure confusion.

“Tha… that’s im… impossible.” I saw her die right in front of me. I was the one who killed her. I cut both arteries in her neck. She couldn’t have survived that!” Centauri yells and I smile.

“Can robots and technology revive a life after clear indication they are permanently dead?” I ask and she looks away.

“They can… but not right now. Our tech will take even longer in order to try something like that but the spirit can’t be killed. Lord suffer took hers and wanted to do things to her, but now she’s back, she’s alive, and more powerful than before. Robots aren’t the ultimate beings, but they sure are a challenge to humans.” I say and she looks back up at me. I wave my hand for her to come over to me and she does.

“Here’s another thing I plan to do to this tainted place.” I say and I raise my hands I concentrate. Soon, all the dead trees begin to come to life, the blackness that surrounded them turns them back to their brown color, the branches springing back up to life as the green leaves begin sprouting again, bringing the life they once had before. I finish and I almost fall forward out the window but Centauri grabs me.

“Are you alright?” she asks laying me back on the ground I chuckle.

“I plan… to try and make… this place and oasis. A place of protection and care to those who deserve it. The corruption will forever stay here, but I will bring some good to this place.” I say and she helps me up.

“If anyone can, its you.” She says and I smile.

“Thank you Centauri. Out of everyone, I always considered you a second mother. Now let’s go and explain everything to everyone.” I say and she nods, probably a bit touched at my words. She helps me and we begin walking to the dining room where everyone else is.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Convincing

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: "Alright Centauri what is Caroline's plan?" I ask. "She wishes to exterminate humans and making everything much more efficient without them, In a way, she wishes to replace humans with Robots" she replies. "But you can't" says Rain but Centauri shakes her head. "You can easily, Build enough robots you can have robots doing everything humans were doing except much much more efficient, Robot workers work an average of 4 days before another robot comes and takes over for the other one to recharge its battery, By calculations this is much more efficient and quicker than humans who need lunch breaks and can screw up easily, Robots however make everything to perfection unless it hits an error" says Centauri. "But why would Caroline do this? What snapped in her?" asks my grandfather. "A few years ago, Caroline somehow shut down her H.O.P which allowed her to grow in intelligence. She no longer had to follow directives but she did so no one suspected her of anything, However the whole time she was running a program that would tell her how to permanently cleanse Earth 1 of Pollution, Crime, Violence and over population, The answer, Extinction" Says Centauri. "Does Caroline have a automatic shutdown?" I ask. "Not anymore, On her old body she did but since then she switched to a form more like me so no one could stop her" replies Centauri before a window smashes behind us and we turn around to see Kia. "Hello, idiots, if you haven't forgotten we still got Zaros, Scar, Cloud and Kora to deal with!" says Kia and I think. "Alright, Centauri, Do what ever you can to slow Caroline and the robots down, do anything at all, we need more time" I say before she nods and I open a portal to earth 1 for her before turning to everyone else to tell them what the plan is.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Debriefing

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Centauri's point of view).
"Now, I must ask, Where did you go? you went off my trackers for 3 hours" says Caroline to me and I nod. "Forgive me, Alex Vinichi shot me with a E.M.P rifle, But I stabbed him through the heart before i temporarily shut down" I say and she nods. "Alright, So he's dead right? I don't have to worry about him and his little friends?" she asks and I nod. "Excellent" she says before turning her attention to her television screens which allow her to direct all robots in a strong fleet to exterminate humans more efficiently. "Caroline, These screens and wires are the only source of your visibility over the armies right?" I ask and she nods. "Why are you asking this?" she asks before I look at a coolant pipe for the computers on the wall. "No important reason..." I say before I quickly sprint over to the wall and I grab hold of the pipe before ripping it off the wall causing a florescent blue liquid to spill out all across the floor freezing the surface of the floor at the first touch. "CENTAURI!!" yells Caroline before I run up and I begin smashing the TV screens and Ripping out cords from the wall that are connected to Caroline. Before I can do anything else Caroline crashes into me and smashes me into the wall. I spin around knocking her arm out of the way and I smash my fist into her face before she grabs my arm and bends it down destroying it before she grabs me and smashes my head into the steel wall. "I am going to make sure you learn your place, Centauri" she says before saying something in a different language and I shut down.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Slowing down.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Scar's point of view).
"How are we suppose to find Lord Suffer?" asks Kora sitting across from me on the train. "We don't, We let them find us" I say before a Caucasian male opens are train car door. He has bright green eyes and stands approx 5 feet 8 inches, he has long brown hair and gold earrings in his ears. He wears a pair of black pants and a pink shirt. "Hello" he says before sitting down beside me and then looking at my uniform. "Wow shit....You know that, that can offend ALOT of people right?" he asks and I pull my Luger P08 pistol out of my jacket and I point it at him before pulling the trigger sending the bullet through his head and he drops down dead. "Gute Nacht Tunte(Good Night Fagot)" I say and Kora looks at me with an aroused look. "Oh I love it when you kill some helpless poor bastard!....Want some happy time before we go kill Lord suffer?" asks Kora and I laugh. "Keep yourself away from me you disease carrying slut" I say back to her and she sits down giggling. "Where are we heading anyways?" she asks. "To say hello" I reply before pulling out a book to read.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Searching.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Rain's point of view).
"Ah, Guten Tag, ich hoffe, Sie alle genießen Sie Ihren schmerzhaften Niedergang" says a man behind us and we all draw our weapons while turning around finding a man wearing a Schutzstaffel Uniform and smiling at us. Standing beside him is a woman with spiked black hair and pale skin. She wears a black robe with a purple trim and some kind of symbols covering it that glow purple. Her eyes are blood red like the Nazi beside her and the Nazi draws a VERY old pistol from his jacket with the SS insignia on the side. Im guessing this is scar and Kora. "Hows about we kick this party up a bit more Kora?" asks Scar giving her a questioning look before she flicks her fingers and her eyes glow purple before I feel a sharp cold breeze over my body before something begins fucking with my head.

(Alex's point of view).
"Ah, Lets see how you all do when your fighting against your loved ones and friends" says scar before I turn around to find Rain, Kia and Sector covered in the same purple symbols. "We will just sit back and watch as your friends and loved ones Murder you horribly" says Scar before Rain charges towards me and Kia charges at Mausso with Sector charging towards his father.

"Rain!" I say blocking her Samik but her eyes are empty and instead of red are glowing purple. "Fight her Rain!" I shout before she brings her paw up and it hits me in the jaw before she spins around and she knocks my sword out of my hand before I am blasted back by her powers and I smash into a tree. She goes to stab me but I barely dodge it and she stabs her samik into the tree. I grab her wrist quickly and I sigh before I twist it, breaking it. She yelps in pain before I grab the back of her head and I bring her muzzle close to my face. "Your not her pet Rain!, Your beat your mother and you still keep fighting!" I shout into her ear before her eyes begin flickering as she tries to fight it.

(Mausso's point of view).
I use my powers to sprint through the forest as fast as possible with Kia shooting through the air in pursuit of me. I sense her directly behind me and I summon my sword before clashing blades with her claws before I make myself transparent and I float through a giant Huk tree before Kia smashes face first into it. I quickly summon my Razor wire and I make it wrap around the tree before grabbing Kia and forcing her against the tree. I pull her hood off and I see Kia smiling with her eyes glowing purple. "Come on Mausso, what are you going to do? Fuck me? I've always known its one of your ultimate wishes you sick fuck! Hahaha!!" she laughs and I give her a punch to the side of the head to knock her out before I put my hand against her forehead. "Ego praecipio tibi ut hunc dimittis puellas mens! (I command you to cease this girls mind!)" I shout before I feel Zora's power leave Kia and I unwrap the razor wire.

(Kora's point of view).
All of my new slaves are fighting my power and somehow winning. "Scar, Kill them while we have the chance!" I shout and he sighs before taking his pistol out and taking aim before his pistol lights on fire with a black and red fire and he pulls the trigger. A ear shattering BOOM!! echo's through the air and a multicolored bullet shoots through the air leaving behind it black fire on the ground.

(Venomous' point of view).
An extremely loud blast shoots through the air and I look just in time to see it heading towards us. "Down!" I say to my son shoving him out of the way even though he is still mind controlled. The bullet crashes into me and an extreme burning pain shreds through my upper body before I feel like I am falling.

(Scar's point of view).
The older snake man jumps infront of his son before my bullet shreds through him and sends him flying through the air, Ultimately hitting a Huk tree and collapsing to the ground with a giant hole now in his chest. "Release your spell witch" I say to Kora with a smile and she does before all those who were mind controlled collapse and begin regaining themselves before Alex looks at me and Kora. "You bastards!" he yells charging towards us and I smile before opening the portal and I walk into the shadow realm. Kora comes to follow me but I quickly turn around and I fire my pistol now with only a quarter of the power that I just used causing her to fall back and then I close the portal.

(Rain's point of view).
"SCAR!!!, SCAR!!!!" screams Kora before I grab her by her hair and I put one of my daggers to her neck. She got shot in the shoulder by the looks of it. "Were gonna have, LOTS of fun Kora" says Kia appearing on her waist and Kora gets fear in her eyes.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Fight.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Sector's point of view).
I wipe my tears from my eyes before sighing while looking at my fathers grave. "Can one of you say something?" I ask looking at my friends and Alex steps forward so he is facing us. "Venomous, Had his faults in his earlier years, But later on in life he was a much better person, He raised a good son and even though I never knew his birth name, he was a good friend" he says before I turn to Kia. "Make her suffer, Please..." I say and she smiles. "Don't worry ill get what I need from her" she replies before opening a portal to the suffer realm.

9 hours later....

(Kia's point of view)
"Ill tell you!, Ill tell you!" shouts Kora and I smile. "gave in quicker than I thought" I say surprised. "I've only cut your tits off, ripped your face off, Put your fingers in a meat grinder, cut your womb out, ripped your scalp off and I also cut all your limbs off....I thought we were going to get much farther than that" I say and she gives me a look of pure anger. "Oh...You got a little something here" I say before making my right index claw turn red hot before jabbing it into her left eye and I pull it back ripping her eye out and she screams in agony again before I look at the eye and I eat it off of my claw. "Really really salty and irony....and very tough" I describe to her and she goes to hit me but the only thing she has left for arms are stumps and I giggle. "Whats the spell?" I ask and I count one second before I slash her across her already mutilated chest and she screams. "Whats the spell?" I ask and I count another second before I slash her again. "Spell" I say and she goes to answer but I slash her again. "Spell" I say and this time she answers immediately. "We walk through shadows!" she shouts and I smile. "Thank you" I say before I make my claws glow bright blue for my soul stealing ability and I slash her across the chest again this time ripping her soul out and I absorb it into my body before her body falls limp now that she is dead. "Yōuxiù (Excellent)" I say smiling before teleporting to Alex. "The spell is We walk through shadows in either Portuguese or Latin" I say and he writes it down. "Alright, Did you get rid of Kora?" he asks and I nod. "I stole her immortal soul" I reply smiling. "We will go to his realm to finish this later" he says and I nod.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Answers and eternal torture.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content: I can't say I like what Alex is doing to the suffer realm but I can't say I don't like what he is doing. "Kia" says Sector and I turn around. "Yes?" I ask before he approaches. "I want Revenge on scar" he says and I smile. "everyone wants revenge, However your a mortal and he is immortal, You don't stand a chance" I say and he nods. "But if I was an immortal like you....I would stand a chance" He says and I smile. "Are you sure you want to give your mortal soul to me?" I ask and he nods. "Alright, Come with me" I say smiling and he follows.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Request.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Alex's point of view).
"nos in tenebris ambulare" I say before a black portal opens and we all look at each other. "lets go" I say before entering the portal and everyone else follows. We go from a light to almost complete darkness. I can barely see Rain in the dark and Kia is almost invisible except for her eyes. On the black walls are glowing red symbols and by the looks of it we are in a maze. "This is the Labyrinth, We are currently in the center of the Shadow realm and we need to get to the end of the maze to find Zaros" says Kia and I look around. "Name me the dangers" I say and she giggles. "Well, We got shadow walkers, Scar, Cloud, Zaros, Shadow mites, Shadow spiders and Shadow hounds mainly" she says and I think. The walls stand about 70 feet tall and by the looks of it someone could walk ontop of them easily. "Why don't we just go over them?" asks Rain noticing the same thing I am. "Zaros put a barrier on them so that only his followers can walk ontop of them, I expect Cloud to be shooting arrows at us within the hour and Scar shooting at us as well, Since they can command the shadow creatures, They have a huge advantage" says Mausso and Rain sighs. "Well talking about it won't help, Lets start moving" says Rain and we begin running through the maze.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Shadow realm.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Rain's point of view).
"Hello" says a voice above us and we look up to see a man standing there wearing a set of leather armor and wearing a black mask that hides his eyes from us. He wields a black bow along with a quiver on his back. "So....I am guessing you 5 are here to kill us then" he says and we don't need to reply. "Well then, lets fight" he says smiling before in a flash he draws an arrow and aims. He lets go of the arrow and I jump to the left before I close my hand with all my strength catching his first arrow before we all take cover around the corner. "Where the hell did you learn that?!" asks Alex. "Father" I say before Alex aims with his pistol and shoots it at Cloud but it doesn't effect him at all. "Not enchanted" says Kia before I untie the knot holding my bow to my back before I draw an arrow and I jump around to corner aiming it but he is gone. "Uh..." I say before he appears again but hundreds of him appear ontop of all the walls. "Only one is real" says Kia and I begin sniffing the air. All the clones draw there bows before taking aim but I know what one is the real one. I turn around while my bow lights on fire before I take aim and I release a flaming arrow at one of the clones and it hits him. All the clones disappear and Cloud collapses from the wall before crashing head first onto the stone ground and his skull cracks open making blood shoot out across the ground on impact. "Nice shot!" says Kia before we hear a click behind us and we turn around just in time to see Scar pull the trigger of his pistol.

(Alex's point of view).
The same flaming bullet flies through the air and flies inbetween us before a shock wave following it sends us flying down the hallway. I scream in shock as I fly through the air like a rag doll crashing into one of my friends in midair before I crash against a wall and I hit the ground. "You and me Suffer!, Enchant your gun and fight me!" shouts Scar down the 400 foot long hallway and I stand up. "To chicken to use a blade?!" I shout down at him and he laughs before putting his pistol away and a sword appears in his hand. His sword has a black hilt with the Nazi swastika in the center. His swords blade is steel but it has a red aura around it. "Alright Suffer you and me" he says before the two of us charge.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Cloud and Scar.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
The second I get within 100 feet of scar a red barrier appears blocking everyone else from helping me. "kämpfen mich" he says and I charge towards him and he does the same. The two of us clash swords before he brings his foot up and kicks me in the groin before I am blasted back through the air but I use it to push my feet against the wall before using my powers to launch me at him and I crash into him knocking him down. He uses his legs to kick me off of him but I use it to get to my feet by doing a backflip. I use my powers to throw him at one of the walls with all my strength and he crashes through it into the other Corridor. I jump through the air with my sword above my head to stab him but I am blasted back through the whole I just made with him and he flies through the air towards me before grabbing my head and smashing it against the wall. Pain is my only thought for a split second before I bring my elbow back and I bash it into his nose.

With one swift movement scar takes his trench coat off before holding it in his left arm before I charge towards him and I swing my sword at him but he uses his coat to wrap it around my sword and ripping it out of my arms before going to stab me but I dodge it and his sword stabs into the wall. I bring my fist up before smashing it across his jaw before he stumbles backwards for a second. He spits out a tooth before smiling and putting his fists up and I smile before getting into a fighting stance and I gesture him to charge and he does. When he gets close I bring my fist up and I smash it into his chin in an uppercut which sends him crashing down onto his ass. I spin around before I raise my foot into the air to axe kick him but when I bring it down he grabs my foot and goes to break my ankle but I move with his twist causing me to crash down on the ground before he stands up and I do the same.

I charge towards Scar before I receive a punch to the teeth before he brings his foot up in a side kick and hits me in the jaw and I hit the floor like a bag of bricks before I see out of the corner of my eye him pulling his sword out of the wall and I grab mine off the floor. I stand up just in time to block a slash and then I spin around managing to slash him across the gut, Sadly not deep enough to do any serious damage but he is bleeding now. I use this time to charge full speed into him head first crashing into him and then he crashes into the solid wall. I feel a bash of pain in my left shoulder and then the center of my back meaning he is trying to get me off. I release him before I bring my fist up and I hit him dead center in the throat stunning him before I bring my sword back to stab him and then I stab forward but he narrowly dodges it causing my sword to bury itself into the wall before he smashes his fist into my temple and I get extremely dizzy. Just after than he kicks my legs out and raises his sword above his head. "Any last words?!" he asks blood down his face and neck from his nose and mouth. "Yeah..." I say slowly recovering before I aim his pistol at him and his eyes widen. "Good Night you Nazi Bastard!" I shout before I pull the trigger and the bullet rips his head off before ripping through the wall and I collapse exhausted as the barriers disappear.
1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Scar Vs Alex Vinichi.

1111111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
(Rain's point of view).
I duck underneath the blade of a shadow walker before I bring my Samik up in a diagonal slash cutting its body in half before I duck underneath another's battle axe from behind.
